Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤‰ΩøÁî®‚Äô‚ÄôÊàñ‚Äù‚ÄùÂàõÂª∫Ôºå‰∏ãÊ†á‰ªéÈõ∂ÂºÄÂßã ËΩ¨‰πâÂ≠óÁ¨¶ÔºöÂíåC++Á±ª‰ºº ËøêÁÆóÔºö+ËøûÊé• *ÈáçÂ§ç []Ëé∑ÂèñÂ≠óÁ¨¶ [:]Êà™ÂèñÔºåÂ∑¶Èó≠Âè≥ÂºÄ >>>a = "12345" >>>a[1:4] 234 Ê†ºÂºèÂåñËæìÂá∫Ôºöprint(‚ÄúXXX%sXXX%dXXX‚Äù % (‚Äòxxx‚Äô, 10)) Âç†‰ΩçÁ¨¶ÂíåC++Áõ∏Âêå ËøêÁÆóÁ¨¶** ÂπÇ / Èô§ // Êï¥Èô§ >>>2**3 8 >>>21/10 2.1 >>>21//10 2 C++ Python $$ and || or ! not in print(l[-2]) #ÂÄíÊï∞Á¨¨2‰∏™ print(l[1:3]) #Á¨¨1Âà∞Á¨¨2‰∏™ del l[1] #Âà†Èô§Á¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ print(l) list.append(2021) #Âú®Êú´Â∞æÊ∑ªÂä†Êñ∞ÂØπË±° print(l) --- ËæìÂá∫Ôºö A 2019 ['B',2019] ['A', 2019, 2020] ['A', 2019, 2020, 2021] Ââ©‰ΩôÂÜÖÂÆπÂæÖÊõ¥Êñ∞ Ë∞ÉÁî®Â∫ìÂâ©‰ΩôÂÜÖÂÆπÂæÖÊõ¥Êñ∞ ÁªÉ‰π†Èöè‰æøÁªÉ‰π†ÂÜô‰∫ÜÂÜôÁöÑ‰∏úË•øÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØtkinter‰∏çÊñπ‰æø‰πü‰∏çÂ•ΩÁúãÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÊàëË¶ÅÂÜçÂ≠¶‰∏Ä‰∏ãPyQtÔºå‰πüÊñπ‰æø‰ª•ÂêéÂ≠¶‰π†C++ÁöÑQt ‰ΩøÁî®bÁ´ôËßÜÈ¢ëavÂè∑Êü•ËØ¢Êï∞ÊçÆË∞ÉÁî®‰∫ÜbÁ´ôÁöÑapi ‰ΩøÁî®‰∫ÜtkinterÊúÄÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÂäüËÉΩ import tkinter as tk import json import re from urllib.request import urlopen def GetDict(date, keys, default=None): keys_list = keys.split('.') if isinstance(date,dict): dictionary = dict(date) for i in keys_list: try: if dictionary.get(i) != None: dict_values = dictionary.get(i) elif dictionary.get(i) == None: dict_values = dictionary.get(int(i)) except: return default dictionary = dict_values return dictionary Videojson = "" def WebRequest(id): global Videojson Videojson = urlopen("https://api.bilibili.com/x/article/archives?ids="+id).read().decode('utf-8') Data = json.loads(Videojson) return Data window = tk.Tk() window.title('ÂìîÂì©ÂìîÂì©Êï∞ÊçÆÊü•ËØ¢') window.geometry('485x475') def insert_point(): VideoId = ScanId.get() VideoData = WebRequest(VideoId) ViewTextWindow.delete(0.0, 'end') TitleTextWindow.delete(0.0, 'end') FavoriteTextWindow.delete(0.0, 'end') DanmuTextWindow.delete(0.0, 'end') ReplyTextWindow.delete(0.0, 'end') CoinTextWindow.delete(0.0, 'end') JsonTextWindow.delete(0.0, 'end') ViewTextWindow.insert('insert', str(GetDict(VideoData, "data."+VideoId+".stat.view"))) TitleTextWindow.insert('insert', GetDict(VideoData, "data."+VideoId+".title")) FavoriteTextWindow.insert('insert', str(GetDict(VideoData, "data."+VideoId+".stat.favorite"))) DanmuTextWindow.insert('insert', str(GetDict(VideoData, "data."+VideoId+".stat.danmaku"))) ReplyTextWindow.insert('insert', str(GetDict(VideoData, "data."+VideoId+".stat.reply"))) CoinTextWindow.insert('insert', str(GetDict(VideoData, "data."+VideoId+".stat.coin"))) JsonTextWindow.insert('insert', Videojson) tk.Label(window, text="ËæìÂÖ•ËßÜÈ¢ëAVÂè∑").place(x=350, y=10, anchor='nw') ScanId = tk.Entry(window) ScanId.place(x=320, y=45, anchor='nw') query = tk.Button(window, text="Êü•ËØ¢", width=6, height=1, command=insert_point) query.place(x=370, y=70, anchor='nw') tk.Label(window, text="Ê†áÈ¢ò").place(x=10, y=10, anchor='nw') TitleTextWindow = tk.Text(window,height=1,width=35) TitleTextWindow.place(x=45, y=15, anchor='nw') tk.Label(window, text="Êí≠Êîæ").place(x=10, y=40, anchor='nw') ViewTextWindow = tk.Text(window,height=1,width=35) ViewTextWindow.place(x=45, y=45, anchor='nw') tk.Label(window, text="Êî∂Ëóè").place(x=10, y=70, anchor='nw') FavoriteTextWindow = tk.Text(window,height=1,width=35) FavoriteTextWindow.place(x=45, y=75, anchor='nw') tk.Label(window, text="ÂºπÂπï").place(x=10, y=100, anchor='nw') DanmuTextWindow = tk.Text(window,height=1,width=35) DanmuTextWindow.place(x=45, y=105, anchor='nw') tk.Label(window, text="ÂõûÂ§ç").place(x=10, y=130, anchor='nw') ReplyTextWindow = tk.Text(window,height=1,width=35) ReplyTextWindow.place(x=45, y=135, anchor='nw') tk.Label(window, text="Á°¨Â∏Å").place(x=10, y=160, anchor='nw') CoinTextWindow = tk.Text(window,height=1,width=35) CoinTextWindow.place(x=45, y=165, anchor='nw') tk.Label(window, text="json").place(x=10, y=190, anchor='nw') JsonTextWindow = tk.Text(window,height=20,width=60) JsonTextWindow.place(x=45, y=195, anchor='nw') window.mainloop() Ëé∑ÂèñbÁ´ôËßÜÈ¢ëÊÄªÊí≠ÊîæÊéíÂêçÂπ∂ÁªòÂà∂Êü±Áä∂ÂõæÈúÄË¶ÅmatplotlibÂ∫ì ‰ΩøÁî®https://www.kanbilibili.comÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÔºåËé∑ÂèñÊõ¥Â§öÊï∞ÊçÆÈúÄË¶ÅÂÜôjsÂØπÁΩëÈ°µËøõË°å‰∫§‰∫íÔºåÁ≠âÂæÖpythonÂ≠¶‰π†‰ª•ÂèäÂâçÁ´ØÂ≠¶‰π†Êù•ËøõË°åÊîπÂñÑ from urllib.request import urlopen import json import re import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np import requests # -*- coding: UTF-8 -*- def get_dict_value(date, keys, default=None): keys_list = keys.split('.') if isinstance(date,dict): dictionary = dict(date) for i in keys_list: try: if dictionary.get(i) != None: dict_values = dictionary.get(i) elif dictionary.get(i) == None: dict_values = dictionary.get(int(i)) except: return default dictionary = dict_values return dictionary videoData = urlopen("https://www.kanbilibili.com/rank/videos").read().decode('utf-8') videoAvList = re.findall(r'href="/video/av(.*?)"', videoData) # <a href="/video/av36570707" videoVisit = {} cnt = 0 Y = [] for i in range(0, len(videoAvList)): video_id = videoAvList[i] if(video_id in videoVisit): continue videoVisit[video_id] = 1 jsonData = urlopen( "https://api.bilibili.com/x/article/archives?ids=" + video_id ).read().decode('utf-8') Data = json.loads(jsonData) cnt += 1 Y.append(get_dict_value(Data, "data."+video_id+".stat.view")) print('rank: %d | av: %s | Êí≠ÊîæÊï∞Ôºö%s' % (cnt, video_id, get_dict_value(Data, "data."+video_id+".stat.view"))) print('Ê†áÈ¢òÔºö%s' % get_dict_value(Data, "data."+video_id+'.title')) n = cnt X = np.arange(n) plt.bar(X, Y) plt.bar(X, Y, facecolor='#66ccff', edgecolor='white') plt.xlim((-0.5, 99)) plt.ylim((1, 100000000)) plt.xlabel('Rank') plt.ylabel('View') new_ticks1 = np.linspace(0, 100000000, 11) plt.yticks(new_ticks1) new_ticks = np.linspace(0, 99, 100) plt.xticks(new_ticks) plt.show()

entry.content: Update on A.D.2019-09-23 Â•ΩÁúãÊòØÁ¨¨‰∏ÄÁîü‰∫ßÂäõ‚Äãqwq Âçï‰∏™GitHubÂ∏êÂè∑‰∏ãÊ∑ªÂä†Â§ö‰∏™GitHub PagesÁöÑÁõ∏ÂÖ≥ÈóÆÈ¢ò| ÊàëÂæàÂ•ΩÂ•á È¶ñÂÖàÊàë‰ª¨Ë¶ÅÁü•ÈÅìGitHub PagesÂèØ‰ª•ÊúâÂ§ö‰∏™ÔºåÈ°πÁõÆÂêç‰∏∫YourGitHubName.github.ioÁöÑPages‰ΩøÁî®Ëøô‰∏™ÂüüÂêçËÆøÈóÆÔºåÊñ∞Ê∑ªÂä†‰∏Ä‰∏™È°πÁõÆProjectNameÂπ∂ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏∫PagesÈ°πÁõÆÂêéÔºå‰ΩøÁî®YourGitHubName.github.io/ProjectNameËøõË°åËÆøÈóÆÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÊàë‰ª¨ÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî®‰∏Ä‰∏™PagesÊâòÁÆ°HexoÂçöÂÆ¢Ôºå‰∏Ä‰∏™PagesÊâòÁÆ°‰∏™‰∫∫‰∏ªÈ°µ. ËøôÈáå‰ªãÁªç‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁΩëÁ´ôÊèê‰æõ‰∫ÜÂæàÂ§ö‰∏™‰∫∫‰∏ªÈ°µÁöÑÊ®°Êùøhttps://html5up.netÊàë‰ª¨ÈÄâÊã©Âπ∂‰∏ãËΩΩÂÖ∂‰∏≠‰∏Ä‰∏™ÔºåÁõ¥Êé•‰øÆÊîπÂç≥ÂèØÔºåÊúâ‰∏ÄÂÆöHTMLÂíåCSSÂü∫Á°ÄÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•ÂæàËΩªÊùæÁöÑ‰øÆÊîπÔºå‰Ω†ÈúÄË¶Å‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊµèËßàÂô®Âπ∂‰ºö‰ΩøÁî®ÊéßÂà∂Âè∞‰ª•ÂèäÊäìÂèñÂÖÉÁ¥†Âíå‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁºñËæëÂô®‰æãÂ¶ÇvscodeÂç≥ÂèØÂºÄÂßãÁºñÂÜô. ÈÇ£‰πà‰Ω†ËøòÈúÄË¶Å‰ºö‰ΩøÁî®gitÂπ∂ÊääËøô‰∏™ÁΩëÁ´ôÁöÑÊ∫ê‰ª£Á†Å‰∏ä‰º†Âà∞GitHubÁöÑrepo‰∏äÔºå‰∏ç‰ºö‰∏äÁΩëÊâæ‰∏™ÊïôÁ®ãÂêß. ÈÇ£ÁÑ∂ÂêéÂ∞±ÊòØÂüüÂêçÁªëÂÆö‰∫ÜÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûú‰Ω†Áî®ÂüüÂêçÁªëÂÆöËøáGitHub PagesÁöÑËØùÔºå‰Ω†Â∞±Áü•ÈÅìÂüüÂêçÁöÑDNSËÆæÁΩÆË¶ÅËÆæÁΩÆÂá†‰∏™AÈÄâÈ°πÔºåËøôÈáå‰∏çËÆ≤ÈÇ£ÊòØÂï•Áé©ÊÑè‰∫ÜÔºåÊÄª‰πãËøô‰∏™ÈÄâÈ°πÊòØËÆæÁΩÆGitHubÁöÑipÂú∞ÂùÄÁöÑÔºåÊúâÁ©∫ÊàëÂÜçÊâæÈìæÊé•ÂêßÔºåËá™Â∑±ÂéªÊü•GitHubÁöÑÊñáÊ°£Â∞±Ë°å„ÄÇÁÑ∂Âêé‰Ω†Ë¶ÅËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏Ä‰∏™CNAMEÔºåËÆæÁΩÆYoutGitHubName.github.ioÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂú®GithubÁöÑrepoÈáåÊ∑ªÂä†‰∏Ä‰∏™CNAMEÊñá‰ª∂ÂÜÖÂÆπÊòØ‰Ω†ÁöÑÂüüÂêçÂÖ®Áß∞Âπ∂‰∏î‰∏çÂ∏¶httpsÔºåwwwËøôÊ†∑ÁöÑÂâçÁºÄ. ÈÇ£‰πàÁé∞Âú®Êúâ‰∏§‰∏™È°µÈù¢ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ÂèØ‰ª•Êää‰∏ªÂüüÂêçËß£ÊûêÂà∞‰∏™‰∫∫‰∏ªÈ°µ‰∏äÔºå‰ΩøÁî®blog‰∫åÁ∫ßÂüüÂêçËß£ÊûêÂà∞ÂçöÂÆ¢‰∏äÔºåÂÖ∑‰ΩìËÆæÁΩÆÂ∞±ÊòØÂú®ÂüüÂêçDNSËÆæÁΩÆÈáåËÆæÁΩÆ‰∫åÁ∫ßÂüüÂêçÂπ∂‰∏îÂêåÊ†∑Ëß£ÊûêÂà∞YoutGitHubName.github.io‰∏äÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂàÜÂà´Âú®‰∏™‰∫∫‰∏ªÈ°µÁöÑCNAMEÈáåËÆæÁΩÆÂüüÂêçÂíåÂçöÂÆ¢ÁöÑCNAMEÈáåËÆæÁΩÆblog.ÂüüÂêçÔºåËÆ∞ÂæóÊâìÂºÄGitHub PagesÁªëÂÆö‰∏™‰∫∫ÂüüÂêçÁöÑhttps. Áé∞Âú®Á≠â‰∏Ä‰ºöDNSËß£ÊûêÁîüÊïàÂíåGitHubÁöÑhttpsËØÅ‰π¶Áî≥ËØ∑ÂÆåÊØïÂ∫îËØ•Â∞±Ê≤°‰ªÄ‰πàÈóÆÈ¢ò‰∫Ü.

entry.title: „ÄåËé´ÊØî‰πåÊñØÂèçÊºî„Äç
entry.content:
Update on A.D.2019-09-23 ÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñôÔºöËé´ÊØî‰πåÊñØÂèçÊºî-ËÆ©Êàë‰ª¨‰ªéÂü∫Á°ÄÂºÄÂßãËé´ÊØî‰πåÊñØÂèçÊºî_cnblogs_peng-ymP2257 YYÁöÑGCD È¢òËß£ÂÆπÊñ•ÂéüÁêÜ ‰∏é Ëé´ÊØî‰πåÊñØÂèçÊºîÊï¥Èô§ÂàÜÂùó_peng-ymOIÁîüÊ∂Ø‰∏≠ÁöÑÂêÑÁßçÊï∞ËÆ∫ÁÆóÊ≥ïÁöÑËØÅÊòé Êï¥Èô§ÂàÜÂùóÂÖ¨ÂºèÊ±ÇÔºö \sum_{i=1}^{n}\lfloor rac{n}{i}floorÂØπ‰∫éÊØè‰∏™$\lfloor rac{n}{i}floor$ÂÄºÁõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÂå∫Èó¥$[l,r]$Êúâ$r=n/(n/l)$ÔºåÂç≥ÂØπ‰∫é$ orall x\in [i,n/(n/i)]$Êúâ$x=\lfloor rac{n}{i}floor$. Êó∂Èó¥Â§çÊùÇÂ∫¶$O(\sqrt{n})$ ‰ª£Á†Åfor(int l = 1, r; l <= n; l = r + 1) { r = n / (n / l); ans += (r - l + 1) * (n / l); } Êï∞ËÆ∫ÂáΩÊï∞Êª°Ë∂≥$f(ab)=f(a)f(b),gcd(a,b)=1$ÁöÑÊï∞ËÆ∫ÂáΩÊï∞Áß∞‰∏∫ÁßØÊÄßÂáΩÊï∞Êª°Ë∂≥$f(ab)=f(a)f(b)$ÁöÑÊï∞ËÆ∫ÂáΩÊï∞Áß∞‰∏∫ÂÆåÂÖ®ÁßØÊÄßÂáΩÊï∞ ÁßØÊÄßÂáΩÊï∞$\varphi(n)$ÔºöÊ¨ßÊãâÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåË°®Á§∫Â∞è‰∫énÁöÑÊ≠£Êï¥Êï∞‰∏≠‰∏én‰∫íË¥®ÁöÑÊï∞ÁöÑÊï∞ÁõÆ \varphi(x)=x\prod_{i=1}^{n}\left(1- rac{1}{p_i}ight)$\mu(n)$ÔºöËé´ÊØî‰πåÊñØÂáΩÊï∞$\sigma(n)$ÔºöÂõ†Â≠êÂíåÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåË°®Á§∫nÁöÑÊ≠£Âõ†Â≠êÂíå$d(n)‚Äã$ÔºöÂõ†Â≠ê‰∏™Êï∞ÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåË°®Á§∫nÁöÑÊ≠£Âõ†Êï∞‰∏™Êï∞ ÂÆåÂÖ®ÁßØÊÄßÂáΩÊï∞$\epsilon(n)=[n=1]$ÔºöÂçï‰ΩçÂáΩÊï∞$id(n)=n$ÔºöÊÅíÁ≠âÂáΩÊï∞$1(n)=1$ÔºöÂ∏∏ÂáΩÊï∞ ÁãÑÂà©ÂÖãÈõ∑Âç∑ÁßØÂØπ‰∫éÊï∞ËÆ∫ÂáΩÊï∞$f(n),g(n)$ÂÆö‰πâDirichletÂç∑ÁßØ‰∏∫ (f	imes g)(n)=\sum_{d\mid n}f(d)g( rac{n}{d})Ëã•$f,g$‰∏∫ÁßØÊÄßÂáΩÊï∞Ôºå$f*g,f	imes g$‰∏∫ÁßØÊÄßÂáΩÊï∞ Â∏∏Áî®ÁöÑÁãÑÂà©ÂÖãÈõ∑Âç∑ÁßØ id=\varphi	imes 1\quad n=\sum_{d\mid n}\varphi(d) \epsilon = \mu 	imes 1 \quad \epsilon(n) = \sum_{d\mid n}\mu(d) \varphi = \mu 	imes id \quad \varphi(n)=\sum_{d\mid n}d\mu( rac{n}{d})=\sum_{d\mid n}\mu(d) rac{n}{d}Ëé´ÊØî‰πåÊñØÂáΩÊï∞ \mu(d) = \left\{ egin{matrix}1,d=1 \ (-1)^n,d=\prod_{i=1}^{n}p_i^{k_i} ,  orall p_i, k_i=1 \ 0,d=\prod_{i=1}^{n}p_i^{k_i} , \exists p_i, k_i\geqslant 2 \end{matrix}ight.Á∫øÊÄßÁ≠õÊ±ÇËé´ÊØî‰πåÊñØÂáΩÊï∞void sieve() { mu[1] = 1; for(int i = 2; i <= N; i++) { if(!vis[i]) prime[++cnt] = i, mu[i] = -1; for(int j = 1; j <= cnt && i * prime[j] <= N; j++) { vis[i * prime[j]] = 1; if(i % prime[j] == 0) break; mu[i * prime[j]] = -mu[i]; } } } ÊÄßË¥®Áî±$\mu 	imes 1 = \epsilon$Âæó \sum_{d|n}\mu(d)=[n=1]Ëé´ÊØî‰πåÊñØÂèçÊºîÂØπ‰∫éÂáΩÊï∞ f=g	imes 1Êúâ g=\mu 	imes fÂç≥ÂØπ‰∫é f(n)=\sum_{d\mid n}g(d)Êúâ g(n)=\sum_{d\mid n}\mu(d)f( rac{n}{d})ProblemP2303 [SDOI2012]LonggeÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò \sum_{i=1}^{n}gcd(i,n)\ =\sum_{d\mid n}d	imes\sum_{i=1}^{n}[gcd(i,n)=d]\ =\sum_{d \mid n}d 	imes \sum_{i=1}^{ rac{n}{d}}[gcd\left ( i, rac{n}{d}ight)=1]\ =\sum_{d \mid n} d \cdot \varphi\left (  rac{n}{d} ight )P2257 YYÁöÑGCDÂéüÂºè =\sum_{k=1}^{min(n,m)}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\sum_{j=1}^{m}[gcd(i,j)=k](k\in prime)Áî± \sum_{d|n}\mu(d)=[n=1]Âæó \sum_{d|gcd(i,j)}\mu(d)=[gcd(i,j)=1]ÂéüÂºè =\sum_{k=1}^{min(n,m)}\sum_{i=1}^{\lfloor{ rac{n}{k}}floor}\sum_{j=1}^{\lfloor{ rac{m}{k}}floor}\sum_{d|gcd(i,j)}\mu(d)(k\in prime) =\sum_{k=1}^{min(n,m)}\sum_{d=1}^{\lfloor{ rac{n}{k}}floor}\mu(d){\lfloor{ rac{n}{kd}}floor}{\lfloor{ rac{m}{kd}}floor})(k\in prime)ËÆæ$T=kd$ÊúâÂéüÂºè =\sum_{k=1}^{min(n,m)}\sum_{d=1}^{\lfloor{ rac{n}{k}}floor}\mu(d){\lfloor{ rac{n}{T}}floor}{\lfloor{ rac{m}{T}}floor}(k\in prime) =\sum_{T=1}^{min(n,m)}{\lfloor{ rac{n}{T}}floor}{\lfloor{ rac{m}{T}}floor}\sum_{k|T,k\in prime}\mu( rac{T}{k})#include <iostream> #include <cstdio> using namespace std; const int _ = 10000005, N = 10000000; int T, n, m, cnt; int vis[_], prime[_], mu[_], f[_], sum[_]; void sieve() { mu[1] = 1; for(int i = 2; i <= N; i++) { if(!vis[i]) prime[++cnt] = i, mu[i] = -1; for(int j = 1; j <= cnt && i * prime[j] <= N; j++) { vis[i * prime[j]] = 1; if(i % prime[j] == 0) break; mu[i * prime[j]] = -mu[i]; } } for(int i = 1; i <= cnt; i++) for(int j = 1; prime[i] * j <= N; j++) f[j * prime[i]] += mu[j]; for(int i = 1; i <= N; i++) sum[i] = sum[i - 1] + f[i]; } int main() { sieve(); scanf("%d", &T); while(T--) { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); if(n > m) swap(n, m); long long ans = 0; for(int l = 1, r = 0; l <= n; l = r + 1) { r = min(n / (n / l), m / (m / l)); ans += 1LL * (n / l) * (m / l) * (sum[r] - sum[l - 1]); } printf("%lld
", ans); } return 0; } P3455 [POI2007]ZAP-Queries \sum_{i=1}^n\sum_{j=1}^m[gcd(i,j)=k] =\sum_{i=1}^{\lfloor{ rac{n}{k}}floor}\sum_{j=1}^{\lfloor{ rac{m}{k}}floor}[gcd(i,j)=1] =\sum_{i=1}^{\lfloor{ rac{n}{k}}floor}\sum_{j=1}^{\lfloor{ rac{m}{k}}floor}\sum_{d\mid gcd(i,j)} \mu(d) =\sum_{d=1}^{min(n,m)}\mu(d)\lfloor{ rac{n}{d}}floor\lfloor{ rac{m}{d}}floor#include <iostream> #include <cstdio> using namespace std; const int _ = 50005, N = 50000; int T, n, m, d; int vis[_], prime[_], mu[_], sum[_], cnt; void sieve() { mu[1] = 1; for(int i = 2; i <= N; i++) { if(!vis[i]) prime[++cnt] = i, mu[i] = -1; for(int j = 1; j <= cnt && i * prime[j] <= N; j++) { vis[i * prime[j]] = 1; if(i % prime[j] == 0) break; mu[i * prime[j]] = -mu[i]; } } for(int i = 1; i <= N; i++) sum[i] = sum[i - 1] + mu[i]; } int main() { sieve(); scanf("%d", &T); while(T--) { scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &d); if(n > m) swap(n, m); n /= d; m /= d; long long ans = 0; for(int l = 1, r = 0; l <= n; l = r + 1) { r = min(n / (n / l), m / (m / l)); ans += 1LL * (n / l) * (m / l) * (sum[r] - sum[l - 1]); } printf("%lld
", ans); } return 0; } P2522 [HAOI2011]Problem b \sum_{i=a}^b\sum_{j=c}^d[gcd(i,j)=k] =\sum_{i=1}^b\sum_{j=1}^d[gcd(i,j)=k]-\sum_{i=1}^{a-1}\sum_{j=1}^d[gcd(i,j)=k]-\sum_{i=1}^b\sum_{j=1}^{c-1}[gcd(i,j)=k]+\sum_{i=1}^{a-1}\sum_{j=1}^{c-1}[gcd(i,j)=k] \sum_{i=1}^n\sum_{j=1}^m[gcd(i,j)=k] =\sum_{i=1}^{\lfloor{ rac{n}{k}}floor}\sum_{j=1}^{\lfloor{ rac{m}{k}}floor}[gcd(i,j)=1] =\sum_{i=1}^{\lfloor{ rac{n}{k}}floor}\sum_{j=1}^{\lfloor{ rac{m}{k}}floor}\sum_{d\mid gcd(i,j)} \mu(d) =\sum_{d=1}^{min(n,m)}\mu(d)\lfloor{ rac{n}{d}}floor\lfloor{ rac{m}{d}}floor#include <iostream> #include <cstdio> using namespace std; const int _ = 50005, N = 50000; int T, a, b, c, d, k; int vis[_], prime[_], mu[_], sum[_], cnt; void sieve() { mu[1] = 1; for(int i = 2; i <= N; i++) { if(!vis[i]) prime[++cnt] = i, mu[i] = -1; for(int j = 1; j <= cnt && i * prime[j] <= N; j++) { vis[i * prime[j]] = 1; if(i % prime[j] == 0) break; mu[i * prime[j]] = -mu[i]; } } for(int i = 1; i <= N; i++) sum[i] = sum[i - 1] + mu[i]; } long long calc(int n, int m, int k) { long long ans = 0; n = n / k; m = m / k; for(int l = 1, r = 0; l <= min(n, m); l = r + 1) { r = min(n / (n / l), m / (m / l)); ans += 1LL * (n / l) * (m / l) * (sum[r] - sum[l - 1]); } return ans; } int main() { sieve(); scanf("%d", &T); while(T--) { scanf("%d%d%d%d%d", &a, &b, &c, &d, &k); long long ans = calc(b, d, k) - calc(a - 1, d, k) - calc(b, c - 1, k) + calc(a - 1, c - 1, k); printf("%lld
", ans); } return 0; }

entry.title: „ÄåÂêéÁºÄÊï∞ÁªÑ„Äç
entry.content: Update on A.D.2019-09-23 ÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñôÔºö1.ÂêéÁºÄÊï∞ÁªÑËØ¶Ëß£2.ÂêéÁºÄÊï∞ÁªÑ-Â≠¶‰π†Á¨îËÆ∞3.ÂêéÁºÄÊï∞ÁªÑ‚Äî‚ÄîÂ§ÑÁêÜÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÁöÑÊúâÂäõÂ∑•ÂÖ∑ ÂÆö‰πâ$SA$ÊéíÂêç‰∏∫$i$ÁöÑÂêéÁºÄÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ$rk$‰ΩçÁΩÆ‰∏∫$i$ÁöÑÂêéÁºÄÁöÑÊéíÂêç$tp$Á¨¨‰∫åÂÖ≥ÈîÆÂ≠óÁöÑÊéíÂêç‰∏∫$i$ÁöÑÂêéÁºÄÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºåËøòË¢´Áî®‰Ωú$rank$ÁöÑÊöÇÂ≠ò$tax$ÊØè‰∏™ÊéíÂêçÂØπÂ∫îÁöÑÂêéÁºÄÊï∞ÈáèÂêéÁºÄÊï∞ÁªÑÂ∞±ÊòØ‰∏∫‰∫ÜÊ±ÇÂá∫$sa$Âíå$rk$ ÊÄßË¥®$rk[sa[i]]=i$ $sa[rk[i]]=i$ $LCP(x,y) $ÔºöÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤x‰∏éÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤yÁöÑÊúÄÈïøÂÖ¨ÂÖ±ÂâçÁºÄÔºåÂú®ËøôÈáåÊåáxÂè∑ÂêéÁºÄ‰∏é‰∏éyÂè∑ÂêéÁºÄÁöÑÊúÄÈïøÂÖ¨ÂÖ±ÂâçÁºÄ $height[i]=lcp ( sa[i],sa[i - 1] )$ÔºåÂç≥ÊéíÂêç‰∏∫$i$ÁöÑÂêéÁºÄ‰∏éÊéíÂêç‰∏∫$i‚àí1$ÁöÑÂêéÁºÄÁöÑÊúÄÈïøÂÖ¨ÂÖ±ÂâçÁºÄ $H[i]Ôºöheight[rak[i]]$ÔºåÂç≥$i$Âè∑ÂêéÁºÄ‰∏éÂÆÉÂâç‰∏ÄÂêçÁöÑÂêéÁºÄÁöÑÊúÄÈïøÂÖ¨ÂÖ±ÂâçÁºÄ $H[i] \geqslant H[i - 1] - 1$ ËØÅÊòé $LCP(i,j)=LCP(j,i) $ $LCP(i,i)=len(sa[i])=n-sa[i]+1$ $LCP(i,k)=min\left\{height[j] \right\}(i+1<=j<=k)$ $S$‰∏çÂêåÁöÑÂ≠ê‰∏≤‰∏™Êï∞$\dfrac{n(n+1)}{2} -\sum_{i=1}^nheight[i]$ ‰ª£Á†Å#include <iostream> #include <cstdio> #include <string> #define R register int using namespace std; const int N = 1000005; string s; /* sa[i]ÔºöÊéíÂêç‰∏∫iÁöÑÂêéÁºÄÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ rak[i]Ôºö‰ªéÁ¨¨i‰∏™‰ΩçÁΩÆÂºÄÂßãÁöÑÂêéÁºÄÁöÑÊéíÂêçÔºå‰∏ãÊñá‰∏∫‰∫ÜÂèôËø∞Êñπ‰æøÔºåÊää‰ªéÁ¨¨i‰∏™‰ΩçÁΩÆÂºÄÂßãÁöÑÂêéÁºÄÁÆÄÁß∞‰∏∫ÂêéÁºÄi tp[i]ÔºöÂü∫Êï∞ÊéíÂ∫èÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∫åÂÖ≥ÈîÆÂ≠óÔºåÊÑè‰πâ‰∏ésa‰∏ÄÊ†∑ÔºåÂç≥Á¨¨‰∫åÂÖ≥ÈîÆÂ≠óÊéíÂêç‰∏∫iÁöÑÂêéÁºÄÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ tax[i]ÔºöiÂè∑ÂÖÉÁ¥†Âá∫Áé∞‰∫ÜÂ§öÂ∞ëÊ¨°„ÄÇËæÖÂä©Âü∫Êï∞ÊéíÂ∫è sÔºöÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤Ôºås[i]Ë°®Á§∫Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤‰∏≠Á¨¨i‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤*/ int n, m, sa[N], rk[N], tp[N], c[N]; void _sort() { for(R i = 1; i <= m; ++i) c[i] = 0; for(R i = 1; i <= n; ++i) c[rk[i]]++; for(R i = 1; i <= m; ++i) c[i] += c[i - 1]; for(R i = n; i >= 1; --i) sa[c[rk[tp[i]]]--] = tp[i]; } void SA() { m = 150; for(R i = 1; i <= n; ++i) rk[i] = s[i - 1], tp[i] = i; _sort(); for(R w = 1, p = 0; p < n && w <= n; m = p, w <<= 1) { p = 0; for(R i = 1; i <= w; ++i) tp[++p] = n - w + i; for(R i = 1; i <= n; ++i) if(sa[i] > w) tp[++p] = sa[i] - w; _sort(); swap(tp, rk); rk[sa[1]] = p = 1; for(R i = 2; i <= n; ++i) rk[sa[i]] = (tp[sa[i - 1]] == tp[sa[i]] && tp[sa[i - 1] + w] == tp[sa[i] + w]) ? p : ++p; } } /*iÂè∑ÂêéÁºÄÔºö‰ªéiÂºÄÂßãÁöÑÂêéÁºÄ lcp(x,y)ÔºöÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤x‰∏éÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤yÁöÑÊúÄÈïøÂÖ¨ÂÖ±ÂâçÁºÄÔºåÂú®ËøôÈáåÊåáxÂè∑ÂêéÁºÄ‰∏é‰∏éyÂè∑ÂêéÁºÄÁöÑÊúÄÈïøÂÖ¨ÂÖ±ÂâçÁºÄ height[i]Ôºölcp(sa[i],sa[i-1])ÔºåÂç≥ÊéíÂêç‰∏∫iÁöÑÂêéÁºÄ‰∏éÊéíÂêç‰∏∫i-1ÁöÑÂêéÁºÄÁöÑÊúÄÈïøÂÖ¨ÂÖ±ÂâçÁºÄ H[i]Ôºöheight[rak[i]]ÔºåÂç≥iÂè∑ÂêéÁºÄ‰∏éÂÆÉÂâç‰∏ÄÂêçÁöÑÂêéÁºÄÁöÑÊúÄÈïøÂÖ¨ÂÖ±ÂâçÁºÄ*/ int Height[N]; void Get() { int j, k = 0; for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) { if(k) k--; j = sa[rk[i] - 1]; while(s[i + k - 1] == s[j + k - 1]) ++k; Height[rk[i]] = k; } } int main() { cin >> s; n = s.length(); SA(); for(R i = 1; i <= n; ++i) printf("%d ", sa[i]); cout << endl; Get(); return 0; } ProblemP2408 ‰∏çÂêåÂ≠ê‰∏≤‰∏™Êï∞ ans=\dfrac{n(n+1)}{2}-\sum height[i]#include <iostream> #include <cstdio> #include <string> #define R register int using namespace std; const int N = 1000005; string s; int n, m, sa[N], rk[N], tp[N], c[N]; void _sort() { for(R i = 1; i <= m; ++i) c[i] = 0; for(R i = 1; i <= n; ++i) c[rk[i]]++; for(R i = 1; i <= m; ++i) c[i] += c[i - 1]; for(R i = n; i >= 1; --i) sa[c[rk[tp[i]]]--] = tp[i]; } void SA() { m = 150; for(R i = 1; i <= n; ++i) rk[i] = s[i - 1], tp[i] = i; _sort(); for(R w = 1, p = 0; p < n && w <= n; m = p, w <<= 1) { p = 0; for(R i = 1; i <= w; ++i) tp[++p] = n - w + i; for(R i = 1; i <= n; ++i) if(sa[i] > w) tp[++p] = sa[i] - w; _sort(); swap(tp, rk); rk[sa[1]] = p = 1; for(R i = 2; i <= n; ++i) rk[sa[i]] = (tp[sa[i - 1]] == tp[sa[i]] && tp[sa[i - 1] + w] == tp[sa[i] + w]) ? p : ++p; } } int Height[N];//H[i] = Height[rk[i]] void Get() { int j, k = 0; for(int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { if(k) k--; j = sa[rk[i] - 1]; while(s[i + k - 1] == s[j + k - 1]) ++k; Height[rk[i]] = k; } } int main() { cin >> n >> s; SA(); Get(); long long ans = 1LL * n * (n + 1) / 2; for(int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) ans -= Height[rk[i]]; cout << ans << endl; return 0; }

entry.title: „ÄåÊ¶ÇÁéáÊúüÊúõ„Äç
entry.content: Update on A.D.2019-09-23 Ê¶ÇÁéáÂÖ¨ÂºèÊù°‰ª∂Ê¶ÇÁéáÂÖ¨ÂºèËÆæ$A,B$ÊòØ‰∏§‰∏™‰∫ã‰ª∂Ôºå‰∏î$P(B)>0$,ÂàôÂú®‰∫ã‰ª∂$B$ÂèëÁîüÁöÑÊù°‰ª∂‰∏ãÔºå‰∫ã‰ª∂$A$ÂèëÁîüÁöÑÊù°‰ª∂Ê¶ÇÁéá‰∏∫$P(A|B)=\dfrac{P(AB)}{P(B)}$ ‰πòÊ≥ïÂÖ¨Âºè1.Áî±Êù°‰ª∂Ê¶ÇÁéáÂÖ¨ÂºèÂæó$P(AB)=P(A|B)P(B)=P(B|A)P(A)$2.Êé®ÂπøÔºöÂØπ$\forall n \geq 2$ÂΩì$P(A_1A_2‚Ä¶A_{n-1})>0$Êó∂Êúâ $P(A_1A_2‚Ä¶A_{n-1}A{n})=P(A_1)P(A_2|A_1)P(A_3|A_1A_2)‚Ä¶P(A_n|A_1A_2‚Ä¶A_{n-1})$ ÂÖ®Ê¶ÇÁéáÂÖ¨ÂºèÂ¶ÇÊûú‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁªÑ$B_1,B_2,‚Ä¶,B_n$Êª°Ë∂≥1.$\forall i\neq j\in \left \{1,2,\cdots ,n \right \},B_i\cap B_j = \varnothing$2.$B_1\cup B_2\cup ‚Ä¶\cup B_n=\Omega$ÂàôÁß∞‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁªÑ$B_1,B_2,‚Ä¶,B_n$ÊòØÊ†∑Êú¨Á©∫Èó¥$\Omega$ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂàíÂàÜ,ÊàñÁß∞‰∏∫Ê†∑Êú¨Á©∫Èó¥$\Omega$ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÆåÂ§á‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁªÑ„ÄÇËÆæ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁªÑ$\left \{B_i \right \}$ÊòØÊ†∑Êú¨Á©∫Èó¥$\Omega$ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂàíÂàÜÔºå‰∏î$P(B_i)>0(i \in \left \{1,2,\cdots ,n \right \})$ÂØπ‰ªª‰∏Ä‰∫ã‰ª∂$A$ÔºåÊúâ$P(A)=\sum_{i=1}^{n}P(B_i)P(A|B_i)$ Ë¥ùÂè∂ÊñØÂÖ¨ÂºèËÆæ‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁªÑ$\left \{B_i \right \}$ÊòØÊ†∑Êú¨Á©∫Èó¥$\Omega$ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂàíÂàÜÔºåÂàôÂØπ‰ªª‰∏Ä‰∫ã‰ª∂$A(P(A)>0)$,Êúâ$P(B_i|A)=\dfrac{P(AB_i)}{P(A)}=\dfrac{P(B_i)P(A|B_i)}{\sum_{j=1}^{n}P(B_j)P(A|B_j)}$‰∏äÂºèÂç≥‰∏∫Ë¥ùÂè∂ÊñØÂÖ¨ÂºèÔºå$B_i$Â∏∏Ë¢´ËßÜ‰∏∫ÂØºËá¥ËØïÈ™åÁªìÊûú$A$ÂèëÁîüÁöÑ‚ÄùÂéüÂõ†‚ÄúÔºå$P(B_i)(i\in \left \{1,2,\cdots ,n \right \})$Ë°®Á§∫ÂêÑÁßçÂéüÂõ†ÂèëÁîüÁöÑÂèØËÉΩÊÄßÂ§ßÂ∞èÔºåÊïÖÁß∞ÂÖàÈ™åÊ¶ÇÁéáÔºõ$P(B_i|A)(i\in \left \{1,2,\cdots ,n \right \})$ÂàôÂèçÊò†ÂΩìËØïÈ™å‰∫ßÁîü‰∫ÜÁªìÊûú$A$‰πãÂêéÔºåÂÜçÂØπÂêÑÁßçÂéüÂõ†Ê¶ÇÁéáÁöÑÊñ∞ËÆ§ËØÜÔºåÊïÖÁß∞ÂêéÈ™åÊ¶ÇÁéá„ÄÇ Êï∞Â≠¶ÊúüÊúõÁ¶ªÊï£ÂûãÈöèÊú∫ÂèòÈáè$X$ÁöÑÂèñÂÄº‰∏∫$x_1,x_2,x_3,‚Ä¶,x_{n}$Ôºå$p_1,p_2,p_3,‚Ä¶,p_{n}$‰∏∫$X$ÂØπÂ∫îÂèñÂÄºÁöÑÊ¶ÇÁéáÂàôÁß∞$E(X)=\sum_{i=1}^{n}p_{i}x_{i}$‰∏∫Á¶ªÊï£ÂûãÈöèÊú∫ÂèòÈáè$X$ÁöÑÊï∞Â≠¶ÊúüÊúõÊÄßË¥®Ôºö$E(aX+bY)=aE(X)+bE(Y)$ ProblemP4316 ÁªøË±ÜËõôÁöÑÂΩíÂÆøËÆæ$F[x]$Ë°®Á§∫‰ªé$x$Ëµ∞Âà∞$N$ÊúüÊúõÈïøÂ∫¶$F[x]=\frac{1}{k}\sum_{i=1}^{k}(F[y_{i}]+z_{i})$$F[N]=0$$Ans=F[1]$P1365 WJMZBMRÊâìosu! / EasyËÆæ$f[x]$Ë°®Á§∫Âà∞$x$ÊúüÊúõÂæóÂàÜ $g[x]$Ë°®Á§∫‰ª•$x$ÁªìÂ∞æÊúüÊúõ$o$Â∫èÂàóÈïøÂ∫¶$s[i]==x f[i]=f[i-1],g[i]=0$$s[i]==o f[i]=f[i-1]+2*g[i-1]+1,g[i]=g[i-1]+1$$s[i]==? f[i]=f[i-1]+\frac{(2g[i-1]+1)+0}{2},g[i]=\frac{(g[i-1]+1)+0}{2}$$Ans=f[n]$P1654 OSU!$p[i]$Ë°®Á§∫$i$‰ΩçÁΩÆÊàêÂäüÊ¶ÇÁéáËÆæ$f[i]$Ë°®Á§∫Âà∞$i$ÊúüÊúõÂæóÂàÜ $x1[i]$‰ª•$i$ÁªìÂ∞æ$1$Â∫èÂàóÊúüÊúõÈïøÂ∫¶ $x2[i]$Ë°®Á§∫‰ª•$i$ÁªìÂ∞æ$1$Â∫èÂàóÊúüÊúõÈïøÂ∫¶Âπ≥Êñπ$(x+1)^{3}=(x^{2}+2x+1)(x+1)=x^{3}+3x^{2}+3x+1$Ëã•Á¨¨$i$Ê¨°ÊàêÂäü‰∏îÊúâ$f[i-1]=x^{3}Âàôf[i]=f[i-1]+3x^{2}+3x+1$$x1[i]=(x1[i-1]+1)p[i]$$x2[i]=(x2[i-1]+2x1[i-1]+1)p[i]$$f[i]=f[i-1]+(3x2[i-1]+3x1[i-1]+1)p[i]$$Ans=f[n]$P1297 [ÂõΩÂÆ∂ÈõÜËÆ≠Èòü]ÂçïÈÄâÈîô‰Ωç$Ans=\sum_{i=1}^{n-1}\frac{1}{max(a_i,a_{i+1})}+\frac{1}{max(a_1,a_n)}$

entry.content: Update on A.D.2019-09-23 ÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñô:STL Âú® OI ‰∏≠ÁöÑÂ∫îÁî®[C++ STL]SetÂíåMultiset Stackstack ÂêéÂÖ•ÂÖàÂá∫ÔºàLIFOÔºâÊ†àÂ§¥Êñá‰ª∂#include<stack> ÂÆö‰πâstack<int> s; ÂáΩÊï∞ ÂáΩÊï∞ > q; ÈòüÂ§¥ÊúÄÂ∞è ÂáΩÊï∞ ÂáΩÊï∞ ÂäüËÉΩ q.top() Ëé∑Âèñ‰ºòÂÖàÈòüÂàó‰∏≠ÊúÄÂ§ßÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†ÔºàÂπ∂‰∏çÂà†Èô§ÔºâÔºåÂÖ∂Êó∂Èó¥Â§çÊùÇÂ∫¶‰∏∫$O(1)$ q.pop() Âà†Èô§‰ºòÂÖàÈòüÂàó‰∏≠ÊúÄÂ§ßÂÖÉÁ¥†ÔºåÂÖ∂Êó∂Èó¥Â§çÊùÇÂ∫¶‰∏∫$O(log n)$ q.push(x) Âêë‰ºòÂÖàÈòüÂàó‰∏≠Âä†ÂÖ•ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÔºåÂÖ∂Êó∂Èó¥Â§çÊùÇÂ∫¶‰∏∫$O(log n)$ q.empty() Âà§Êñ≠‰ºòÂÖàÈòüÂàóÊòØÂê¶‰∏∫Á©∫ Set ‰∏é Multiset set‰∏çÂÖÅËÆ∏ÈáçÂ§ç multisetÂÖÅËÆ∏ÈáçÂ§ç ‰æã: set : 1 2 3 4 5 6 multiset : 1 2 2 3 3 3 Â§¥Êñá‰ª∂#include <set> ÂÆö‰πâmultiset<int> s[N];//ÂÆö‰πâ multiset<int>::iterator it;//Ëø≠‰ª£Âô® ÂáΩÊï∞ Êìç‰Ωú ÊïàÊûú s.size() ËøîÂõûÂΩìÂâçÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†Êï∞Èáè s.empty () Âà§Êñ≠Â§ßÂ∞èÊòØÂê¶‰∏∫Èõ∂ÔºåÁ≠âÂêå‰∫é$0==size()$ÔºåÊïàÁéáÊõ¥È´ò Êìç‰Ωú ÊïàÊûú count (elem) ËøîÂõûÂÖÉÁ¥†ÂÄº‰∏∫$elem$ÁöÑ‰∏™Êï∞ find(elem) ËøîÂõûÂÖÉÁ¥†ÂÄº‰∏∫$elem$ÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÊ≤°ÊúâËøîÂõû$end()$ lower _bound(elem) ËøîÂõûÂÖÉÁ¥†ÂÄº$>=elem$ÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÖÉÁ¥†‰ΩçÁΩÆ upper _bound (elem) ËøîÂõûÂÖÉÁ¥†ÂÄº$>elem$ÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÖÉÁ¥†‰ΩçÁΩÆ Êìç‰Ωú ÊïàÊûú s.begin() ËøîÂõû‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈöèÊú∫Â≠òÂèñËø≠‰ª£Âô®ÔºåÊåáÂêëÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÖÉÁ¥† s.end() ËøîÂõû‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈöèÊú∫Â≠òÂèñËø≠‰ª£Âô®ÔºåÊåáÂêëÊúÄÂêé‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÁöÑ‰∏ã‰∏Ä‰∏™‰ΩçÁΩÆ Êìç‰Ωú ÊïàÊûú s.insert(elem) ÊèíÂÖ•‰∏Ä‰∏™$elem$ÂâØÊú¨ÔºåËøîÂõûÊñ∞ÂÖÉÁ¥†‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºåÊó†ËÆ∫ÊèíÂÖ•ÊàêÂäü‰∏éÂê¶„ÄÇ s.erase(elem) Âà†Èô§‰∏é$elem$Áõ∏Á≠âÁöÑÊâÄÊúâÂÖÉÁ¥†ÔºåËøîÂõûË¢´ÁßªÈô§ÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†‰∏™Êï∞„ÄÇ s.erase(pos) ÁßªÈô§Ëø≠‰ª£Âô®$pos$ÊâÄÊåá‰ΩçÁΩÆÂÖÉÁ¥†ÔºåÊó†ËøîÂõûÂÄº„ÄÇ s.clear() ÁßªÈô§ÊâÄÊúâÂÖÉÁ¥†ÔºåÂ∞ÜÂÆπÂô®Ê∏ÖÁ©∫ Á¶ªÊï£Âåñstd::uniqueÂäüËÉΩÔºöÂØπÊúâÂ∫èÁöÑÂÆπÂô®ÈáçÊñ∞ÊéíÂàóÔºåÂ∞ÜÁ¨¨‰∏ÄÊ¨°Âá∫Áé∞ÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†‰ªéÂâçÂæÄÂêéÊéíÔºåÂÖ∂‰ªñÈáçÂ§çÂá∫Áé∞ÁöÑÂÖÉÁ¥†‰æùÊ¨°ÊéíÂú®ÂêéÈù¢ËøîÂõûÂÄºÔºöËøîÂõûËø≠‰ª£Âô®ÔºåËø≠‰ª£Âô®ÊåáÂêëÁöÑÊòØÈáçÂ§çÂÖÉÁ¥†ÁöÑÈ¶ñÂú∞ÂùÄ std::lower_boundlower_bound()ËøîÂõû‰∏Ä‰∏™ iterator ÂÆÉÊåáÂêëÂú®[first,last)Ê†áËÆ∞ÁöÑÊúâÂ∫èÂ∫èÂàó‰∏≠ÂèØ‰ª•ÊèíÂÖ•valueÔºåËÄå‰∏ç‰ºöÁ†¥ÂùèÂÆπÂô®È°∫Â∫èÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºåËÄåËøô‰∏™‰ΩçÁΩÆÊ†áËÆ∞‰∫ÜÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™Â§ß‰∫éÁ≠â‰∫évalue ÁöÑÂÄº„ÄÇForwardIter lower_bound(ForwardIter first, ForwardIter last,const _Tp& val)ÁÆóÊ≥ïËøîÂõû‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈùûÈÄíÂáèÂ∫èÂàó[first, last)‰∏≠ÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™Â§ß‰∫éÁ≠â‰∫éÂÄºvalÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ std::upper_boundupper_bound()ËøîÂõû‰∏Ä‰∏™ iterator ÂÆÉÊåáÂêëÂú®[first,last)Ê†áËÆ∞ÁöÑÊúâÂ∫èÂ∫èÂàó‰∏≠ÂèØ‰ª•ÊèíÂÖ•valueÔºåËÄå‰∏ç‰ºöÁ†¥ÂùèÂÆπÂô®È°∫Â∫èÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™‰ΩçÁΩÆÔºåËÄåËøô‰∏™‰ΩçÁΩÆÊ†áËÆ∞‰∫ÜÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™Â§ß‰∫évalue ÁöÑÂÄº„ÄÇËøô‰∏§‰∏™ÂáΩÊï∞‰∏∫C++ STLÂÜÖÁöÑÂáΩÊï∞„ÄÇForwardIter upper_bound(ForwardIter first, ForwardIter last, const _Tp& val)ÁÆóÊ≥ïËøîÂõû‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈùûÈÄíÂáèÂ∫èÂàó[first, last)‰∏≠Á¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™Â§ß‰∫évalÁöÑ‰ΩçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ std::sort(b + 1, b + cnt + 1); int *end = std::unique(b + 1, b + cnt + 1); for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) a[i] = lower_bound(b + 1, end, a[i]) - b;

entry.title: „ÄåÂàÜÂ±ÇÂõæ„Äç
entry.content:
Update on A.D.2019-09-23 ÈóÆÈ¢òÂú®‰∏Ä‰∏™Êó†ÂêëÂõæ$G=(V,E)$‰∏≠ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÊîπÂèò$k$Êù°ËæπÁöÑÊùÉÂÄº‰∏∫$\Delta w$ÔºåÊ±ÇÂçïÊ∫êÊúÄÁü≠Ë∑ØÂæÑ„ÄÇ ÂàÜÂ±ÇÂõæÂàÜÂ±ÇÂõæÁöÑÊÉ≥Ê≥ïÂ∞±ÊòØÂ¶ÇÊûúÊúâ$k$Êù°ËæπÊùÉÂÄºÂèò‰∏∫$\Delta w$ÔºåÂ∞±Âª∫$k+1$Â±ÇÂõæ„ÄÇ Ëøô‰∏™ÂõæÂÆûÈôÖ‰∏äÊòØËøôÊ†∑ÁöÑÔºåÂØπ‰∫éÊØè$1$Â±Ç‰∏≠Áõ∏ËøûÁöÑÁÇπÂØπ$(u,v)$ËøûÊùÉÂÄº‰∏∫$w$ÁöÑÊó†ÂêëËæπÔºåÂØπ‰∫éÊØè‰∏™Âú®ÂéüÂõæ‰∏≠Áõ∏ËøûÁöÑÁÇπÂØπ$(u,v)$Áî±$k$Â±ÇÁÇπ$u_k$Âêë$k+1$Â±ÇÁÇπ$v_{k+1}$‰ª•Âèä$k$Â±ÇÁÇπ$v_k$Âêë$k+1$Â±ÇÁÇπ$u_{k+1}$ËøûÊùÉÂÄº‰∏∫$\Delta w$ÁöÑÊúâÂêëËæπÔºåÊñπÂêëÊòØ‰ªé$k$Â±ÇÂêë$k+1$Â±Ç„ÄÇËøôÊ†∑ÊûÑÈÄ†ÂÆåÊàê‰∏ÄÂº†ÂàÜÂ±ÇÂõæÂêéÔºå‰ªéÁ¨¨$1$Â±ÇÁöÑËµ∑ÂßãÁÇπ$s_1$Ê±ÇÂçïÊ∫êÊúÄÁü≠Ë∑ØÂæÑÔºåÊúÄÁªàÁ¨¨$k + 1$Â±ÇÁöÑÁªàÁÇπ$t_{k+1}$ÁöÑÂçïÊ∫êÊúÄÁü≠Ë∑ØÂæÑÂÄºÂç≥‰∏∫Á≠îÊ°àÊâÄÊ±Ç„ÄÇÂéüÁêÜÂÖ∂ÂÆûÂæàÁÆÄÂçïÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûú‰ªé$k$Â±ÇÂõæÂà∞$k+1$Â±ÇÂõæÔºåÊúâÂêëËæπ$(u_k,v_{k+1})$ÊòØ‰∏ÄÊù°$\Delta w$ÊùÉËæπÔºåËµ∞ËøôÊù°ËæπÔºåÁõ∏ÂΩì‰∫éÊää$w$ÊùÉËæπÂèòÊàê‰∫Ü$\Delta w$ÊùÉËæπÔºåÂπ∂‰∏îËøõÂÖ•‰∫Ü$k+1$Â±Ç„ÄÇËøôÊ†∑Â¶ÇÊûúÊúâ$k+1$Â±ÇÂõæÁöÑËØùÔºåÁõ∏ÂΩì‰∫éËøõË°å‰∫Ü$k$Ê¨°ËøôÁßçÊìç‰ΩúÔºåËá™ÁÑ∂Â∞±Âú®$k+1$Â±ÇÂõæÊ±ÇÊúÄÁü≠Ë∑Ø‰∏≠ÂÆûÁé∞‰∫Ü$k$Ê¨°ÊîπÂèòËæπÊùÉÁöÑÁõÆÊ†á„ÄÇ È¢òÁõÆP2939 [USACO09FEB]ÊîπÈÄ†Ë∑ØRevamping Trails#include <iostream> #include <cstdio> #include <cstring> #include <queue> using namespace std; const int N = 1e4 + 5, M = 5e4 + 5, K = 105; int n, m, k; struct Edge { int Next, to, dis; }e[M * K * 2]; int head[N * K], num; void add(int from, int to, int dis) { e[++num].Next = head[from]; e[num].to = to; e[num].dis = dis; head[from] = num; } int dist[N * K], vis[N * K]; struct node { int u, d; bool operator < (const node &x) const { return d > x.d; } }; priority_queue<node> q; void dijk() { memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof(dist)); dist[1] = 0; q.push((node){1, 0}); while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.top().u; q.pop(); if(vis[u]) continue; vis[u] = 1; for(int i = head[u]; i; i = e[i].Next) { int v = e[i].to, w = e[i].dis; if(dist[v] > dist[u] + w) { dist[v] = dist[u] + w; if(!vis[v]) q.push((node){v, dist[v]}); } } } } int main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &k); for(int i = 1, u, v, z; i <= m; i++) { scanf("%d%d%d", &u, &v, &z); add(u, v, z); add(v, u, z); for(int j = 1; j <= k; j++) { add(j * n + u, j * n + v, z); add(j * n + v, j * n + u, z); add((j - 1) * n + u, j * n + v, 0); add((j - 1) * n + v, j * n + u, 0); } } dijk(); int ans = 0x3fffffff; for(int i = 1; i <= k + 1; i++) ans = min(dist[i * n], ans); printf("%d
", ans); return 0; } P4568 [JLOI2011]È£ûË°åË∑ØÁ∫ø#include <iostream> #include <cstdio> #include <queue> #include <cstring> using namespace std; const int N = 1e4 + 5, M = 5e4 + 5, K = 12; int n, m, k; int s, t; struct _edge { int Next, v, w; }e[M * K * 4 + M * 2]; int head[N * K], num; void add(int from, int to, int dis) { e[++num].Next = head[from]; e[num].v = to; e[num].w = dis; head[from] = num; } int dist[N * K], vis[N * K]; struct node { int u, d; bool operator < (const node &x) const { return d > x.d; } }; priority_queue<node> q; void dijk(int x) { memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof(dist)); dist[x] = 0; q.push((node){x, 0}); while(!q.empty()) { node tp = q.top(); q.pop(); int u = tp.u; if(u == t + k * n) break; if(vis[u]) continue; vis[u] = 1; for(int i = head[u]; i; i = e[i].Next) { int v = e[i].v, w = e[i].w; if(dist[v] > dist[u] + w) { dist[v] = dist[u] + w; if(!vis[v]) q.push((node){v, dist[v]}); } } } } int main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &k); scanf("%d%d", &s, &t); s++, t++; for(int i = 1, u, v, z; i <= m; i++) { scanf("%d%d%d", &u, &v, &z); u++, v++; add(u, v, z); add(v, u, z); for(int j = 1; j <= k; j++) { add(j * n + u, j * n + v, z); add(j * n + v, j * n + u, z); add((j - 1) * n + u, j * n + v, 0); add((j - 1) * n + v, j * n + u, 0); } } dijk(s); int ans = 1e9; for(int i = 0; i <= k; i++) ans = min(ans, dist[t + i * n]); printf("%d
", ans); return 0; } P4822 [BJWC2012]ÂÜªÁªì#include <iostream> #include <cstdio> #include <cstring> #include <queue> using namespace std; const int N = 55, M = 1005, K = 55; int n, m, k; struct Edge { int Next, to, dis; }e[M * K * 10]; int head[N * K * 10], num; void add(int from, int to, int dis) { e[++num].Next = head[from]; e[num].to = to; e[num].dis = dis; head[from] = num; } struct node { int u, d; bool operator < (const node& x) const { return d > x.d; } }; priority_queue<node> q; int dist[N * K * 10], vis[N * K * 10]; void dijk() { memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof(dist)); dist[1] = 0; q.push((node){1, 0}); while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.top().u; q.pop(); if(vis[u]) continue; vis[u] = 1; for(int i = head[u]; i; i = e[i].Next) { int v = e[i].to, w = e[i].dis; if(dist[v] > dist[u] + w) { dist[v] = dist[u] + w; if(!vis[v]) q.push((node){v, dist[v]}); } } } } int main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &k); for(int i = 1, u, v, z; i <= m; i++) { scanf("%d%d%d", &u, &v, &z); add(u, v, z); add(v, u, z); for(int j = 1; j <= k; j++) { add(j * n + u, j * n + v, z); add(j * n + v, j * n + u, z); add((j - 1) * n + u, j * n + v, z >> 1); add((j - 1) * n + v, j * n + u, z >> 1); } } dijk(); int ans = 0x7fffffff; for(int i = 1; i <= k + 1; i++) ans = min(ans, dist[i * n]); printf("%d
", ans); return 0; }

entry.title: „ÄåÁΩëÁªúÊµÅ„Äç
entry.content:
Update on A.D.2019-09-23 ‰∏Ä‰∫õËµÑÊñôÔºöÊúÄËØ¶ÁªÜÁΩëÁªúÊµÅÂª∫Ê®°Âü∫Á°Ä Ê®°ÊùøÊúÄÂ§ßÊµÅDinicÊ≤°ÂÜôÂΩìÂâçÂºß‰ºòÂåñ‰ªÄ‰πàÁöÑ. ÂºÉÂùë‰∫ÜÔºåISAPÂíåHLPPÊúâÁºòÂÜçÂ≠¶. P3376 „ÄêÊ®°Êùø„ÄëÁΩëÁªúÊúÄÂ§ßÊµÅ #include <iostream> #include <cstdio> #include <queue> #include <cstring> const int inf = 0x3fffffff; const int N = 10005, M = 100005; int n, m, s, t, maxflow; int d[N]; struct Edge { int Nxt, v, flow; }e[M << 1]; int h[N], p = 1; void add(int u, int v, int z) { e[++p].Nxt = h[u]; e[p].v = v; e[p].flow = z; h[u] = p; e[++p].Nxt = h[v]; e[p].v = u; e[p].flow = 0; h[v] = p; } std::queue<int> q; bool bfs() { memset(d, 0, sizeof(d)); while(!q.empty()) q.pop(); q.push(s); d[s] = 1; while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop(); for(int i = h[u]; i; i = e[i].Nxt) if(e[i].flow && !d[e[i].v]) { q.push(e[i].v); d[e[i].v] = d[u] + 1; if(e[i].v == t) return true; } } return false; } int dinic(int u, int flow) { if(u == t) return flow; int rest = flow, k; for(int i = h[u]; i && rest; i = e[i].Nxt) if(e[i].flow && d[e[i].v] == d[u] + 1) { k = dinic(e[i].v, std::min(rest, e[i].flow)); if(!k) d[e[i].v] = 0; e[i].flow -= k; e[i ^ 1].flow += k; rest -= k; } return flow - rest; } int main() { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &n, &m, &s, &t); for(int i = 1, u, v, z; i <= m; i++) { scanf("%d%d%d", &u, &v, &z); add(u, v, z); } int flow = 0; while(bfs()) while(flow = dinic(s, inf)) maxflow += flow; printf("%d
", maxflow); return 0; } Ë¥πÁî®ÊµÅEKP3381 „ÄêÊ®°Êùø„ÄëÊúÄÂ∞èË¥πÁî®ÊúÄÂ§ßÊµÅ #include <iostream> #include <cstdio> #include <queue> #include <cstring> const int _ = 50005; const int inf = 0x3f3f3f3f; int n, m, s, t; int ans, maxflow; int dist[_], incf[_], pre[_], vis[_]; struct Edge { int Nxt, v, flow, cost; } e[_ << 1]; int h[_], p = 1; void add(int u, int v, int f, int c) { e[++p].Nxt = h[u]; e[p].v = v; e[p].flow = f; e[p].cost = c; h[u] = p; e[++p].Nxt = h[v]; e[p].v = u; e[p].flow = 0; e[p].cost = -c; h[v] = p; } std::queue<int> q; bool spfa() { memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof(dist)); memset(vis, 0, sizeof(vis)); q.push(s); dist[s] = 0; vis[s] = 1; incf[s] = inf; while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop(); vis[u] = 0; for(int i = h[u]; i; i = e[i].Nxt) { if(!e[i].flow) continue; int v = e[i].v; if(dist[v] > dist[u] + e[i].cost) { dist[v] = dist[u] + e[i].cost; incf[v] = std::min(incf[u], e[i].flow); pre[v] = i; if(!vis[v]) vis[v] = 1, q.push(v); } } } if(dist[t] == inf) return false; else return true; } void update() { int u = t; while(u != s) { int i = pre[u]; e[i].flow -= incf[t]; e[i ^ 1].flow += incf[t]; u = e[i ^ 1].v; } maxflow += incf[t]; ans += dist[t] * incf[t]; } int main() { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &n, &m, &s, &t); for(int i = 1, u, v, z, c; i <= m; i++) { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &u, &v, &z, &c); add(u, v, z, c); } while(spfa()) update(); printf("%d %d
", maxflow, ans); return 0; } Problem[NOI2008]ÂøóÊÑøËÄÖÊãõÂãüÁÆóÊ≥ïÔºöÁ∫øÊÄßËßÑÂàí or ÊúâÊ∫êÊ±á‰∏ä‰∏ãÁïåÊúÄÂ∞èË¥πÁî®ÂèØË°åÊµÅÂèØ‰ª•Êó†ËßÜ‰∏ÄÂºÄÂßãÂπªÊÉ≥ËøôÊ†∑ÂèØ‰ª•ÊêûÔºö ‰ΩÜÂÖ∂ÂÆûÂæàÈöæÈôêÂà∂Êù°‰ª∂Âπ∂‰∏îÊµÅÈáèÂπ∂‰∏çËÉΩÂáÜÁ°Æ‰∏ÄÂØπÂ§öÂéªË¶ÜÁõñÁÇπ„ÄÇ ÊâÄ‰ª•ÊòØÂª∫ÊàêËøôÊ†∑ÁöÑÔºö ‰ΩÜÊòØ‰∏∫‰ªÄ‰πàÂØπÂë¢ÔºåÂÖ∂ÂÆûÈùûÂ∏∏ÁéÑÂ≠¶ÔºåÊàëËßâÂæóËøòÊòØÊâãÂä®Ê®°Êãü‰∏Ä‰∏ã‰∏ç‰ºöËØÅÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÊÑüÊÄßÁêÜËß£„ÄÇ Ê®°ÊãüÊó∂ÂèØ‰ª•ÂèëÁé∞$inf-A[i]$ÂÖ∂ÂÆûÂØπ‰∫∫Êï∞ÈôêÂà∂ÂèñÂèçÔºå‰ª£Ë°®Ë¶ÅË∑ëÂÆåËøôÊù°ËæπÊâÄÊúâÊµÅÈáèÔºåÊµÅÂà∞$0$‰πãÂâçÁöÑÊµÅÈáèÊòØÊ≤°ÊúâÂÆûÈôÖ‰ΩúÁî®ÁöÑÔºåÊòØ‰∏∫‰∫ÜÂèØ‰ª•ÂÖàË∑≥ËøáËøôÂ§©ÔºåÁõ¥Âà∞ÊµÅÈáè‰∏∫$0$ÂêéÔºå‰ª£Ë°®ËøôÊù°ËæπÈúÄË¶ÅÂºÄÂßãÈÄâÊã©‰∫∫ËøõË°åÂ∑•‰ΩúÔºåËÄåËøôÊù°ËæπÈúÄË¶ÅÁöÑ‰∫∫Êï∞ÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøáÂà´ÁöÑËæπÂèçÊò†Âá∫Êù•ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•‰ªéÁ∫¢ËæπÂç≥‰∫∫Ë°•ÂÖ®ËøôÊù°Èìæ‰∏ä‰∏∫$0$ÁöÑËæπÊó†Ê≥ïÈÄöËøáÁöÑÊµÅÈáèÔºåÈÄöËøáÊúÄÂ∞èË¥πÁî®ÊúÄÂ§ßÊµÅÂç≥ÂèØÊ±ÇÂá∫ÊúÄÂ∞èË¥πÁî®„ÄÇ $n+1->t$ËøôÊù°ËæπÂèØ‰ª•ÂèçÊò†Âá∫ÂΩìÂâçËøòÂâ©ÁöÑÊú™ËßÑÂàíÁöÑÊúÄÂ§ß‰∫∫Êï∞ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•$n+1->t$ÊµÅÈáè‰∏∫$0$Êó∂Ôºå‰ª£Ë°®‰πãÂâçÊúÄÂ§ßÊµÅÈáèÊµÅÂ∞ΩÔºåÂç≥$(inf-A[i])_{max}$ÔºåÂç≥$A[i]_{min}$„ÄÇ [NOI2012]ÁæéÈ£üËäÇ‰ªéÁÆóÊ≥ïÂà∞ÁÆóÊúØÔºå‰ΩøÁî®Â∞èÂ≠¶Êï∞Â≠¶Âπ∂Âà©Áî®Â§ßÈáèÁÆóÊúØÊäÄÂ∑ßËÆ°ÁÆóÁÇπÁöÑÈÅçÂè∑ #include <iostream> #include <cstdio> #include <cstring> #include <queue> #define R register using namespace std; const int N = 45, M = 105, sP = 805, _ = N + M * sP + 5; const int inf = 0x3f3f3f3f; int n, m, s, t, sum, tim[N][M], P[N]; struct Edge { int Next, v, flow, cost; } e[(N + N * M * sP + M * sP + 5) << 1]; int h[N + M * sP + 5], p = 1; inline void add(R int u, R int v, int f, int c) { e[++p].Next = h[u]; e[p].v = v; e[p].flow = f; e[p].cost = c; h[u] = p; e[++p].Next = h[v]; e[p].v = u; e[p].flow = 0; e[p].cost = -c; h[v] = p; } int dist[_], incf[_], maxflow, ans, vis[_], pre[_]; queue<int> q; bool spfa() { memset(vis, 0, sizeof(vis)); memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof(dist)); dist[s] = 0; vis[s] = 1; q.push(s); incf[s] = inf; while(!q.empty()) { int u = q.front(); q.pop(); vis[u] = 0; for(int i = h[u]; i; i = e[i].Next) if(e[i].flow) { int v = e[i].v; if(dist[v] > dist[u] + e[i].cost) { dist[v] = dist[u] + e[i].cost; incf[v] = min(incf[u], e[i].flow); pre[v] = i; if(!vis[v]) q.push(v), vis[v] = 1; } } } if(dist[t] == inf) return false; else return true; } inline void update() { R int u = t; while(u != s) { int i = pre[u]; e[i].flow -= incf[t]; e[i ^ 1].flow += incf[t]; u = e[i ^ 1].v; } maxflow += incf[t]; ans += dist[t] * incf[t]; } int main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for(R int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%d", &P[i]), sum += P[i]; s = 0, t = m * sum + n + 1; for(R int i = 1; i <= n; i++) for(R int j = 1; j <= m; j++) scanf("%d", &tim[i][j]); for(R int i = 1; i <= n; i++) add(s, i, P[i], 0); for(R int i = n + 1; i <= n + m * sum; i += sum) add(i, t, 1, 0); for(R int i = 1; i <= n; i++) for(R int j = n + 1, t = 1; j <= n + m * sum; j += sum) add(i, j, 1, tim[i][t++]); while(spfa()) { update(); int u = e[pre[t] ^ 1].v; if((u - n) % sum == 0) break; int v = u + 1; int k = (v - n) % sum == 0 ? sum : (v - n) % sum; int j = (v - n - k) / sum + 1; add(v, t, 1, 0); for(R int i = 1; i <= n; i++) add(i, v, 1, k * tim[i][j]); } printf("%d
", ans); return 0; } ÊúÄÂ§ßÊùÉÈó≠ÂêàÂ≠êÂõæ ÂèÇËÄÉËµÑÊñôÔºö‚Äî‚Äî-1‚Äî‚Äî-‚Äî‚Äî-2‚Äî‚Äî-‚Äî‚Äî-3‚Äî‚Äî- ÂÆöÁêÜÊúÄÂ§ßÊùÉÈó≠ÂêàÂ≠êÂõæÊùÉÂÄº=Ê≠£ÊùÉÁÇπ‰πãÂíå-ÊúÄÂ∞èÂâ≤

entry.title: „ÄåÁ∫øÊÆµÊ†ë„Äç
entry.content: Update on A.D.2019-09-23 Ê®°Êùøstruct Segment_Tree { #define ls (p << 1) #define rs (p << 1 | 1) #define mid ((l + r) >> 1) ll ans[_ << 2], tag[_ << 2]; inline void pushup(ll p) { ans[p] = ans[ls] + ans[rs]; } inline void pushdown(ll p, ll l, ll r) { ans[ls] += (mid - l + 1) * tag[p]; tag[ls] += tag[p]; ans[rs] += (r - mid) * tag[p]; tag[rs] += tag[p]; tag[p] = 0; } void build(ll p, ll l, ll r) { if(l == r) { ans[p] = a[l]; return; } build(ls, l, mid); build(rs, mid + 1, r); pushup(p); } void update(ll p, ll l, ll r, ll ul, ll ur, ll k) { if(ul <= l && r <= ur) { ans[p] += (r - l + 1) * k; tag[p] += k; return; } if(tag[p]) pushdown(p, l, r); if(ul <= mid) update(ls, l, mid, ul, ur, k); if(ur > mid) update(rs, mid + 1, r, ul, ur, k); pushup(p); } ll query(ll p, ll l, ll r, ll ql, ll qr) { if(ql <= l && r <= qr) return ans[p]; if(tag[p]) pushdown(p, l, r); ll res = 0; if(ql <= mid) res += query(ls, l, mid, ql, qr); if(qr > mid) res += query(rs, mid + 1, r, ql, qr); return res; } #undef ls #undef rs #undef mid }T; È¢òÁõÆÁª¥Êä§ÂèØÂä†ÊÄßÂèòÈáèËß£ÂÜ≥ÈóÆÈ¢òP3707 [SDOI2017]Áõ∏ÂÖ≥ÂàÜÊûê\bar{x}=\frac{1}{R-L+1}\sum x_i‚Äã\bar{y}=\frac{1}{R-L+1}\sum y_i\hat{a}=\dfrac{\sum_{i=L}^R(x_i-\bar{x})(y_i-\bar{y})}{\sum_{i=L}^R(x_i-\bar{x})^2}ËÆ∞$\sum = \sum_{i=L}^{R}‚Äã$ QueryAns=\dfrac{ \sum x_iy_i-\bar{x}\sum y_i-\bar{y}\sum x_i+\sum \bar{x}\bar{y}}{\sum x_i^2-2\bar{x}\sum x_i+\sum\bar{x^2}}=\dfrac{ \sum x_iy_i-\frac{1}{R-L+1}\sum x_i\sum y_i-\frac{1}{R-L+1}\sum y_i\sum x_i+\sum \frac{1}{R-L+1}\sum x_i\frac{1}{R-L+1}\sum y_i}{\sum x_i^2-\frac{1}{R-L+1}2\sum x_i\sum x_i+\sum (\frac{1}{R-L+1}\sum x_i)^2}=\dfrac{ \sum x_iy_i-\frac{\sum x_i\sum y_i}{R-L+1}}{\sum x_i^2-\frac{(\sum x_i)^2}{R-L+1}}‰∏ã‰º†TagÔºöÂÖà$upd$Âêé$addX \quad addY$ Áª¥Êä§ÂÄºÔºö$t1=\sum x$ | $t2=\sum y$ | $t3=\sum xy$ | $t4=\sum x^2$ Áª¥Êä§TagÔºö$addX \quad addY$ \hat{a}=\dfrac{t3-\frac{t1t2}{R-L+1}}{t4-\frac{t1^2}{R-L+1}}Add\Delta x = S \quad \Delta y= T\sum (x + S) = \sum x_i+(R-L+1)S\sum(y+T)=\sum y_i+(R-L+1) T\sum(x+S)(y+T)=\sum(xy+Sy+Tx+ST)=\sum xy+S\sum y+T\sum x+(R-L+1)ST\sum(x+S)^2=\sum x^2+2S\sum x+(R-L+1)S^2‰∏ã‰º†TagÔºöÂÖà$upd$Âêé$addX \quad addY$ È°∫Â∫èÔºöÂÖà$t3,t4$Âêé$t1,t2$ UpdateËá™ÁÑ∂Êï∞Âπ≥ÊñπÂíåÔºö\sum_{i=1}^ni=\frac{n(n+1)(2n+1)}{6} 1.$\forall i \in [L,R]\quad x_i=i y_i=i$ \sum x=\sum y = \sum i = \frac{(R-L+1)(R+L)}{2}\sum x^2 = \sum xy = \sum i ^2 = \sum_{i=1}^R i^2-\sum_{i=1}^{L-1}i^2=\frac{R(R+1)(2R+1)}{6}-\frac{L(L-1)(2L-1)}{6}‰∏ã‰º†TagÔºöÂÖà$upd$Âêé$addX \quad addY$ Ê∏ÖÁ©∫Tag $addX \quad addY$ Ê†áËÆ∞Tag $upd$ 2.ADD L R S T Code#include <iostream> #include <cstdio> #define ll long long using namespace std; const int N = 100005; int n, m; double X[N], Y[N]; struct Segment_Tree { #define ls (p << 1) #define rs (p << 1 | 1) #define mid ((l + r) >> 1) bool upd[N << 2]; double x[N << 2], y[N << 2]; double t1[N << 2], t2[N << 2], t3[N << 2], t4[N << 2]; inline void pushup(ll p) { t1[p] = t1[ls] + t1[rs]; t2[p] = t2[ls] + t2[rs]; t3[p] = t3[ls] + t3[rs]; t4[p] = t4[ls] + t4[rs]; } inline void pushdown(ll p, ll l, ll r) { double L = mid - l + 1, R = r - mid; if(upd[p]) { double Ll = l, Lr = mid, Rl = mid + 1, Rr = r; t1[ls] = t2[ls] = (Lr - Ll + 1.0) * (Lr + Ll) / 2.0; t1[rs] = t2[rs] = (Rr - Rl + 1.0) * (Rr + Rl) / 2.0; t3[ls] = t4[ls] = Lr * (Lr + 1.0) * (2.0 * Lr + 1.0) / 6.0 - Ll * (Ll - 1.0) * (2.0 * Ll - 1.0) / 6.0; t3[rs] = t4[rs] = Rr * (Rr + 1.0) * (2.0 * Rr + 1.0) / 6.0 - Rl * (Rl - 1.0) * (2.0 * Rl - 1.0) / 6.0; upd[ls] = upd[rs] = upd[p]; upd[p] = 0; x[ls] = x[rs] = y[ls] = y[rs] = 0; } if(x[p] || y[p]) { t3[ls] += x[p] * t2[ls] + y[p] * t1[ls] + L * x[p] * y[p]; t3[rs] += x[p] * t2[rs] + y[p] * t1[rs] + R * x[p] * y[p]; } if(x[p]) { t4[ls] += 2 * x[p] * t1[ls] + L * x[p] * x[p]; t4[rs] += 2 * x[p] * t1[rs] + R * x[p] * x[p]; t1[ls] += L * x[p]; t1[rs] += R * x[p]; x[ls] += x[p]; x[rs] += x[p]; x[p] = 0; } if(y[p]) { t2[ls] += (double)L * y[p]; t2[rs] += (double)R * y[p]; y[ls] += y[p]; y[rs] += y[p]; y[p] = 0; } } void build(ll p, ll l, ll r) { if(l == r) { t1[p] = X[l]; t2[p] = Y[l]; t3[p] = X[l] * Y[l]; t4[p] = X[l] * X[l]; return; } upd[p] = x[p] = y[p] = 0; build(ls, l, mid); build(rs, mid + 1, r); pushup(p); } void add(ll p, ll l, ll r, ll ql, ll qr, double S, double T) { if(ql <= l && r <= qr) { double len = (r - l + 1); t3[p] += S * t2[p] + T * t1[p] + len * S * T; t4[p] += 2 * S * t1[p] + len * S * S; t1[p] += len * S; t2[p] += len * T; x[p] += S; y[p] += T; return; } pushdown(p, l, r); if(ql <= mid) add(ls, l, mid, ql, qr, S, T); if(qr > mid) add(rs, mid + 1, r, ql, qr, S, T); pushup(p); } void update(ll p, ll l, ll r, ll ql, ll qr) { if(ql <= l && r <= qr) { t1[p] = t2[p] = (double)(r - l + 1.0) * (l + r) / 2.0; t3[p] = t4[p] = (double)r * (r + 1.0) * (2.0 * r + 1) / 6.0 - (double)l * (l - 1.0) * (2.0 * l - 1.0) / 6.0; x[p] = y[p] = 0; upd[p] = 1; return; } pushdown(p, l, r); if(ql <= mid) update(ls, l, mid, ql, qr); if(qr > mid) update(rs, mid + 1, r, ql, qr); pushup(p); } double query(ll p, ll l, ll r, ll ql, ll qr, ll f) { if(ql <= l && r <= qr) { if(f == 1) return t1[p]; if(f == 2) return t2[p]; if(f == 3) return t3[p]; if(f == 4) return t4[p]; } pushdown(p, l, r); double res = 0; if(ql <= mid) res += query(ls, l, mid, ql, qr, f); if(qr > mid) res += query(rs, mid + 1, r, ql ,qr, f); return res; } #undef ls #undef rs #undef mid }; struct Segment_Tree Tree; int main() { scanf("%d %d", &n, &m); for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%lf", &X[i]); for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%lf", &Y[i]); Tree.build(1, 1, n); int opt, L, R; double S, T; while(m--) { scanf("%d", &opt); if(opt == 1) { scanf("%d %d", &L, &R); double t1 = Tree.query(1, 1, n, L, R, 1); double t2 = Tree.query(1, 1, n, L, R, 2); double t3 = Tree.query(1, 1, n, L, R, 3); double t4 = Tree.query(1, 1, n, L, R, 4); double a_ = (t3 - (t1 * t2) / (double)(R - L + 1)) / (t4 - (t1 * t1) / (double)(R - L + 1)); printf("%.10lf\n", a_); } else if(opt == 2) { scanf("%d %d %lf %lf", &L, &R, &S, &T); Tree.add(1, 1, n, L, R, S, T); } else if(opt == 3) { scanf("%d %d %lf %lf", &L, &R, &S, &T); Tree.update(1, 1, n, L, R); Tree.add(1, 1, n, L, R, S, T); } } return 0; } TagÁöÑÁî®Ê≥ïÂå∫Èó¥01ÂèñÂèçxorÂå∫Èó¥ÁøªËΩ¨revÂå∫Èó¥ÊúÄÈïøËøûÁª≠1/0Âå∫Èó¥min/maxÂ≠êÊÆµÂíåP2572 [SCOI2010]Â∫èÂàóÊìç‰Ωú Êâ´ÊèèÁ∫øÁü©ÂΩ¢Èù¢ÁßØÂπ∂P1502 Á™óÂè£ÁöÑÊòüÊòüP1856 [USACO5.5]Áü©ÂΩ¢Âë®ÈïøPicture ‰∫åÁª¥Á∫øÊÆµÊ†ëÊ†ëÂ•óÊ†ëP3437 [POI2006]TET-Tetris 3D ÂÖ∂ÂÆÉLuogu P2061 [USACO07OPEN]ÂüéÂ∏ÇÁöÑÂú∞Âπ≥Á∫øCity HorizonÁÆÄÂçïÈ¢ò ÁÆóÊ≥ïÁ∫øÊÆµÊ†ë + Á¶ªÊï£Âåñ ÊÄùË∑ØÂØπ$(x,y,h)$ÁöÑÂ∑¶Âè≥Á´ØÁÇπ$x,y$ËøõË°åÁ¶ªÊï£ÂåñÔºåÁ¶ªÊï£ÂåñÂâçÁöÑÂéüÂÄºËÆ∞‰∏∫$val[i]$ÔºåÂØπÊØè‰∏™Áü©ÂΩ¢ÊåâÈ´òÂ∫¶$h$‰ªéÂ∞èÂà∞Â§ßÊéíÂ∫è„ÄÇ ËÆæÁ¶ªÊï£ÂåñÂêéÁöÑÁ´ØÁÇπÊúâ$M$‰∏™ÔºåÂàôÂØπÂ¶ÇÂõæÊâÄÁ§∫$M-1$‰∏™ËßÑÂàôÁü©ÂΩ¢ÁºñÂè∑‰∏∫$[1,M-1]$ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Áî±$h_{[i, i+1]}\times(val[i+1] - val[i])$ÂæóÂá∫Á¨¨$i$‰∏™Áü©ÂΩ¢ÁöÑÈù¢ÁßØ„ÄÇ ÂºÄ‰∏ÄÈ¢óÂå∫Èó¥‰∏∫$[1,M-1]$ÁöÑÁ∫øÊÆµÊ†ëÔºåÊåâ$h$‰ªéÂ∞èÂà∞Â§ß‰æùÊ¨°ÂØπÁ∫øÊÆµÊ†ëÂå∫Èó¥Ë¶ÜÁõñÔºåÂèØ‰ª•‰øùËØÅÈ´òÁöÑÁü©ÂΩ¢Ë¶ÜÁõñ‰∫Ü‰ΩéÁöÑÁü©ÂΩ¢ÁöÑÂå∫Èó¥ÔºåÂÖ∑‰ΩìÊìç‰Ωú‰∏∫ÂØπÁ¶ªÊï£ÂåñÂêéÁöÑ$(x,y,h)$ÔºåËøõË°åÁ∫øÊÆµÊ†ë$[x,y-1]$Âå∫Èó¥Ë¶ÜÁõñ$h$ÂÄºÔºåÊúÄÁªà$i$ÁÇπÂ≠òÂÇ®$h_{[i,i+1]}$ÁöÑÊúÄÂ§ßÂÄº„ÄÇ $h_{[i, i+1]}$ÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøáÁ∫øÊÆµÊ†ëÂçïÁÇπÊü•ËØ¢$i$ÁÇπÊ±ÇÂá∫„ÄÇ Á≠îÊ°àÔºö$\sum_{i=1}^{M-1}h_{[i, i+1]}\times(val[i+1] - val[i])$ ‰ª£Á†Å#include <iostream> #include <cstdio> #include <algorithm> #define ll long long using namespace std; const int N = 80005; int n, b[N], val[N];//b[]:Á¶ªÊï£ÂåñÊï∞ÁªÑ struct Line { int x, y, h; }a[N];//Â≠òÂÇ®ÊØè‰∏™Áü©ÂΩ¢ bool cmp(Line a, Line b) { return a.h < b.h; } int ans[N << 2];//Á∫øÊÆµÊ†ëÊï∞ÁªÑ #define ls (p << 1) #define rs (p << 1 | 1) #define mid ((l + r) >> 1) void update(int p, int l, int r, int ul, int ur, int k) { if(ul <= l && r <= ur) { ans[p] = k; return; } if(ans[p]) ans[ls] = ans[rs] = ans[p], ans[p] = 0;//Âå∫Èó¥Ë¶ÜÁõñÁõ¥Êé•‰∏ãÊé® if(ul <= mid) update(ls, l, mid, ul, ur, k); if(ur > mid) update(rs, mid + 1, r, ul, ur, k); } ll query(int p, int l, int r, int x)//ÂçïÁÇπÊü•ËØ¢ { if(l == r) return ans[p]; if(ans[p]) ans[ls] = ans[rs] = ans[p], ans[p] = 0;//Âå∫Èó¥Ë¶ÜÁõñÁõ¥Êé•‰∏ãÊé® if(x <= mid) return query(ls, l, mid, x); if(x > mid) return query(rs, mid + 1, r, x); } #undef ls #undef rs #undef mid int main() { scanf("%d", &n); for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) { scanf("%d%d%d", &a[i].x, &a[i].y, &a[i].h); b[i] = a[i].x; b[n + i] = a[i].y;//Á¶ªÊï£ÂåñÊï∞ÁªÑËÆ∞ÂΩï‰∏ãÊâÄÊúâx,y } sort(b + 1, b + 2 * n + 1);//ÊéíÂ∫è int _n = unique(b + 1, b + 2 * n + 1) - (b + 1);//ÂéªÈáçÔºå_n‰∏∫ÂéªÈáçÂêéx,yÁ´ØÁÇπ‰∏™Êï∞ for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) if(a[i].x != a[i].y)//x=yÊ≤°Êúâ‰ΩúÁî® { int x = a[i].x, y = a[i].y; a[i].x = lower_bound(b + 1, b + _n + 1, a[i].x) - b; a[i].y = lower_bound(b + 1, b + _n + 1, a[i].y) - b;//Á¶ªÊï£Âåñ val[a[i].x] = x; val[a[i].y] = y;//ÂéüÂÄº } sort(a + 1, a + n + 1, cmp);//Êåâh‰ªéÂ∞èÂà∞Â§ßÊéíÂ∫è for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) if(a[i].x != a[i].y)//Èò≤Ê≠¢y-1<x update(1, 1, _n - 1, a[i].x, a[i].y - 1, a[i].h);//Êõ¥Êñ∞,Ê≥®ÊÑèÁªìÁÇπ‰∏™Êï∞ÊòØ_n-1ÔºåÁ´ØÁÇπyË¶ÅÂèòÊàêÁü©ÂΩ¢Âå∫Âüüy-1ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÁîªÂõæÁêÜËß£‰∏Ä‰∏ãÔºåÁõ∏ÂΩì‰∫éÊääÁ´ØÁÇπxÂè≥ËæπÁöÑÁü©ÂΩ¢Âå∫ÂüüÁºñÂè∑‰∏∫x ll res = 0; for(int i = 1; i < _n; i++) res += query(1, 1, _n - 1, i) * (val[i + 1] - val[i]); printf("%lld\n", res); return 0; }

entry.content: Update on A.D.2019-10-26 Áª¥Êä§ÊñáÊ°£ COSMOS1.A.D.2019.10.251.ÁúüÂÆû‰∫∫ÂêçÊõøÊç¢‰∏∫ID. 2.ÂØπÂéüÊúâÁöÑËøáÂ∫¶Â§∏Âº†ÈÉ®ÂàÜÂèä‰∫∫Áâ©ÂΩ¢Ë±°‰∏çÊòéÁ°ÆÈÉ®ÂàÜËøõË°å‰øÆÊîπ. COSMOS-1 COSMOS1.A.D.1997Tommy_clasÂá∫Áîü‰∫Ü„ÄÇ ‰ªñ1‰∏™Êúà‰ºöËØ¥‰∏≠ÊñáÔºå2‰∏™Êúà‰ºöËØ¥Ëã±ÊñáÔºå‰∏ÄÂë®Â≤ÅËã±ËØ≠ËØçÊ±áÈáèÂçÅ‰∏áÔºå‰∏§Âë®Â≤ÅÂ≠¶‰ºöÊâÄÊúâ‰∏≠ÊñáËØçËØ≠ÔºåËÆ§ËØÜÊâÄÊúâÊ±âÂ≠óÔºå‰∏ÄÂ≤ÅÂ≠¶ÂÆåÈ´òÊï∞Á≤æÈÄöC++Ôºå‰∫åÂ≤ÅÁúãÊáÇÊäΩ‰ª£ÊéåÊè°ÊâÄÊúâÁºñÁ®ãËØ≠Ë®ÄÔºå‰∏§Â≤ÅÂçäÁúãÊáÇ‰∫ÜÊâÄÊúâ‰∫∫Á±ªÊï∞Â≠¶Áü•ËØÜÔºå‰∏âÂ≤ÅÂ≠¶ÂÆå‰∫∫Á±ªÊâÄÊúâÁâ©ÁêÜÂ≠¶„ÄÇ ‰∏ñÁïå‰∏äÊâÄÊúâÁßëÂ≠¶ÂÆ∂ÈÉΩËØ¥ÔºåÊãØÊïë‰∫∫Á±ªÁöÑÂ§©ÊâçÂá∫Áé∞‰∫Ü„ÄÇ COSMOS-1.A.D.2022Â§™Èò≥Ê†∏ÂèçÂ∫îÊ¥ªÂä®ÂºÇÂ∏∏ÔºåÊ∞îÂÄôÊÄ•ÂâßÂèòÂåñÔºå‰∫∫‰ª¨ÂºÄÂßãË∫≤ÂÖ•Âú∞‰∏ãÔºåÁßëÂ≠¶ÂÆ∂‰ª¨È¢ÑË®Ä‰∫∫Á±ªÁöÑÊú´Êó•Â∞ÜË¶ÅÊù•‰∏¥‰∫Ü„ÄÇ Tommy_clasÂæÆÂæÆ‰∏ÄÁ¨ëÔºåÊòéÁôΩËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÊú∫‰ºöÂà∞‰∫Ü„ÄÇ COSMOS-1.A.D.2039ÂåóÂçäÁêÉ8ÊúàÁöÑÊ∏©Â∫¶Á™ÅÁ†¥‰∫Ü$47‚ÑÉ$ÔºåÂú∞‰∏ãÂüéÂ∑≤ÁªèÂª∫ËÆæÂÆåÊØï‰∫ÜÔºåÂú∞Èù¢‰∏ä‰∫∫ÁöÑË∏™ÂΩ±Ê∏êÊ∏êÊ∂àÂ§±‰∫Ü„ÄÇ LoliÂá≠ÂÄüÁùÄËá™Â∑±30Âπ¥ÁöÑÂ§ßÂ≠¶ÊïôÈæÑÂíåÁßëÂ≠¶ÂÆ∂Ë∫´‰ªΩÊó©Êó©ÁöÑÂàÜÈÖçÂà∞‰∫ÜCM-CH-DY-P7-Y2Âú∞‰∏ãÂüéSl-H7-y-8I-2Âå∫‰∏ÄÂ•ó128Â±ÇÊ•ºÁöÑÁ©∫‰∏≠‰ΩèÊàøÔºåÂú∞‰∏ãÂüéÁªöÁÉÇÁöÑÈúìËôπÁÅØÈó™ÁÉÅÁùÄÔºåÂÖâÁ∫øÈ£ûÂêë‰ªñÁöÑÁúºÁùõ„ÄÇ ‚Äú20Âπ¥ÂâçÔºå‰πüÊòØËøôÊ†∑‚ÄùLoliÊÄùÁ¥¢ÁùÄÔºå‚ÄúÂ§ßÊ¶ÇÊòØ2019Âπ¥8Êúà„ÄÇ‚Äù ‚ÄúÊàëÂñúÊ¨¢Áâ©ÁêÜÂ≠¶ÔºåÂñúÊ¨¢Â§©ÊñáÔºåÂ∞èÊó∂ÂÄô‰ª∞ÊúõÂçäÂ§úÁöÑÊòüÁ©∫Êó∂Ôºå‰ºº‰πéËÉΩÁúãËßÅÂÆáÂÆôÁöÑÊòéÊòéÁÅ≠ÁÅ≠ÔºåÂêéÊù•Êàë‰∏ä‰∫Ü‰∏™‰∫åÊú¨Â§ßÂ≠¶ÔºåÂ§ß‰∏âÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÊàëÊ≤°Êó•Ê≤°Â§úÁöÑÂ≠¶‰π†ÈáèÂ≠êÂú∫ËÆ∫ÔºåÈÇ£ÁÆÄÁõ¥ÊòØÁ•ûÊâçËÉΩÁ™•ËßÅ‰∏ÄËßíÁöÑ‰∏úË•ø‚Äù LoliÂõûÂøÜÁùÄËá™Â∑±ÁöÑÂæÄ‰∫ãÔºåÁªôTommy_clasÂèôËø∞„ÄÇ ‚ÄúÂèØÊòØÂêéÊù•ÊàëÊòéÁôΩ‰∫ÜÔºåËÆ°ÁÆóÊú∫ÁßëÂ≠¶ÊâçÊòØÊú™Êù•ÔºåÂ•ΩÂ•ΩÂ≠¶OIÂêßÔºå‰∫∫Á±ªÈ©¨‰∏äÂ∞±Ë¶ÅÊØÅÁÅ≠‰∫ÜÔºåÁâ©ÁêÜÂ≠¶Ëµ∞Âà∞‰∫ÜÁ©∑ÈÄîÊú´Ë∑ØÔºåÂÆÉ‰∏ç‰ºöÂÜçÊúâ‰ªÄ‰πàÁî®‰∫Ü„ÄÇ‚Äù Tommy_clasÈ©¨‰∏äÂ∞±Ë¶Å‰πòÂùêÈ£ûËàπËµ∞‰∫ÜÔºåLoliÊù•ËßÅ‰ªñÊúÄÂêé‰∏ÄÈù¢ÔºåLoliËôΩÊòØÈ°∂Â∞ñÁöÑÁßëÂ≠¶ÂÆ∂ÔºåÂç¥Âõ∫ÊâßÁöÑ‰∏çÊÑøÈöèÈ£ûËàπÁ¶ªÂºÄ„ÄÇ COSMOS-1.A.D.2183Â§™Èò≥ÂèëÁîüÁàÜÁÇ∏Ôºå‰∫∫Á±ªÂú®144Âπ¥ÂâçËÄóË¥π‰∫ÜÂú∞ÁêÉÁöÑÊâÄÊúâËµÑÊ∫êÂπ∂Á©∑Â∞Ω‰∫ÜÁâ©ÁêÜÂíåÊï∞Â≠¶Áü•ËØÜÂª∫ÈÄ†‰∫ÜÊó∂Á©∫Ë¥üË¥®ÈáèÂèçÁâ©Ë¥®Â∑•Ë¥®Êõ≤ÁéáÊé®Âä®ËÉΩÈ£ûËàπÔºåÈ£ûËàπ‰∏äÔºåÊâÄÊúâ‰∫∫Á±ªÂÆû‰ΩìÂÆåÊàê‰∫ÜÁîüÁâ©Êï∞ÊçÆÁöÑÈáèÂ≠êÂåñÂπ∂‰æùÊâò‰∫éÈáèÂ≠êËÆ°ÁÆóÊú∫ÂΩ¢ÊàêÊÑèËØÜÔºåÂú®ÂÆáÂÆôËà™Ë°å‰∏≠ÂèëÁé∞‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™Êñ∞ÁöÑÊòüÁ≥ªÔºåÂÆÉ‰Ωç‰∫éÈì∂Ê≤≥Á≥ªÊÇ¨ËáÇÁöÑËæπÁºò„ÄÇ ÂêéÊù•ÔºåÂåÖÊã¨Tommy_clasÂú®ÂÜÖ2756Âêç‰∫∫Á±ªÂà∞Ëææ‰∫ÜË°åÊòüÂπ∂ÂºÄÂßã‰∫ÜÊñáÊòéÁöÑÈáçÊñ∞Âª∫ËÆæÔºåTommy_clasÂç¥Â∑≤ÁªèÂØÜË∞ãÂ•Ω‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊØÅÁÅ≠‰∫∫Á±ª„ÄÅÊØÅÁÅ≠ÂÆáÂÆôÁöÑÊÉäÂ§©Èò¥Ë∞ãÔºå‰∏∫Ê≠§ÔºåTommy_clasËä±Ë¥π‰∫Ü2^19260817‰∏™ÊòüÁ≥ªÁöÑËµÑÊ∫êÔºåÂª∫ÈÄ†‰∫ÜÈïøËææÊï∞‰∫ø‰∫øÂÖâÂπ¥ÈïøÁöÑÁ≤íÂ≠êÂä†ÈÄüÂô®ÔºåÁéØÁªï‰∫ÜÈì∂Ê≤≥Á≥ª998244353Âúà„ÄÇ entry.title: „ÄåFFT/NTT„Äç„ÄåÂ§öÈ°πÂºè„Äç
entry.content: Update on A.D.2019-08-15 ÂøÖÂøòÂéüÁêÜÁöÑFFT ÊµãËØï‰∏Ä‰∏ãËßÜÈ¢ëÔºåÁÑ∂ËÄåË≤å‰ººÂè™ÊúâbilibiliÁöÑÂ§ñÈìæÊØîËæÉÂ•ΩÊÄª‰∏çËÉΩÊîæYoutubeÔºüÔºåÁÑ∂ËÄåÈ¨ºÁïúÁöÑ‰∫åÁª¥Á†Å‰∏éÈ°∂ÈÉ®ÈìæÊé•ÊØîÂâçÂá†Âπ¥Âú®mcbbsÁúãÁöÑÊó∂ÂÄôÁÉÇÂ§ö‰∫Ü„ÄÇ Âú®2019Âπ¥8Êúà15Êó•ÔºåÁªà‰∫éÁúãÊáÇ‰∫ÜFFTÁöÑÊé®ÂØºËøáÁ®ã„ÄÇ È¶ñÂÖàÊòØFFTÁöÑÊùøÂ≠êÔºåËøô‰∏™ÂÜôÊ≥ïÂÖ∂ÂÆûÂæà‰ºòÁæéËÆ∞‰∏ç‰ΩèÁöÑ„ÄÇ #include <iostream> #include <cstdio> #include <cmath> #include <complex> #define R register using namespace std; const int N = 4.2e6; const double PI = acos(-1); int n, r[N]; class C { public: double r, i; C() { r = i = 0; } C(R double x, R double y) { r = x; i = y; } C operator + (R C& x) { return C(r+x.r, i+x.i); } C operator - (R C& x) { return C(r-x.r, i-x.i); } C operator * (R C& x) { return C(r*x.r-i*x.i, r*x.i+i*x.r); } void operator += (R C& x) { r += x.r; i += x.i; } void operator *= (R C& x) { R double t = r; r = r*x.r-i*x.i; i = t*x.i+i*x.r; } }f[N], g[N]; inline void FFT(R C *a, R int op) { R C W, w, t, *a0, *a1; R int i, j, k; for (i = 0; i < n; ++i) if (i < r[i]) t = a[i], a[i] = a[r[i]], a[r[i]] = t; for(i = 1; i < n; i <<= 1) for(W = C(cos(PI/i), sin(PI/i) * op), j = 0; j < n; j += i << 1) for(w = C(1, 0), a1 = i + (a0 = a + j), k = 0; k < i; ++k, ++a0, ++a1, w*=W) t = *a1 * w, *a1 = *a0 - t, *a0 += t; } int main() { R int m, i, l = 0; scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for(i = 0; i <= n; i++) scanf("%lf", &f[i].r); for(i = 0; i <= m; i++) scanf("%lf", &g[i].r); for(m += n, n = 1; n <= m; n <<= 1, ++l); for(i = 0; i < n; ++i) r[i] = (r[i >> 1] >> 1) | ((i & 1) << (l - 1)); FFT(f, 1); FFT(g, 1); for(i = 0; i < n; ++i) f[i] *= g[i]; FFT(f, -1); for(i = 0; i <= m; ++i) printf("%.0lf ", fabs(f[i].r) / n); return 0; } ÂíïÔºåÈ©¨‰∏äË°•.

entry.title: „ÄåÂä®ÊÄÅËßÑÂàí„Äç
entry.content: Update on A.D.2019-10-17 Êé®‰∏çÂá∫ÁöÑDPÊñπÁ®ã ÈöèÊÑèËÆ∞ÁÇπÂä®ÊÄÅËßÑÂàíÁöÑÊñπÁ®ãÔºåÂ§ßÊ¶ÇÊòØNOIPÈöæÂ∫¶ÁöÑ„ÄÇ ProblemÊ∞¥È¢òLuoguP1472 Â•∂ÁâõÂÆ∂Ë∞± Cow PedigreesÈ¢òÊÑèÔºöÊúâ$n$‰∏™ÁªìÁÇπ$k$Â±ÇÁöÑ‰∫åÂèâÊ†ëÁªìÊûÑ‰∏™Êï∞ÔºåÊ†ëÂè™ËÉΩÊúâ$2$‰∏™ÂÑøÂ≠êÊàñ$0$‰∏™ÂÑøÂ≠ê„ÄÇ ËÆæ$dp[n][k]$‰∏∫Êúâ$n$‰∏™ÁªìÁÇπ‰∏çÂà∞$k$Â±ÇÁöÑÁ≠îÊ°àÔºåÂàôÁ≠îÊ°àÂÆπÊñ•‰∏Ä‰∏ã‰∏∫$dp[n][k]-dp[n][k-1]$ÔºåËΩ¨Áßª‰ªé‰∏ãÊää‰∏§Ê£µÊ†ëËøûÊé•Âà∞‰∏ä‰∏ÄÂ±ÇÁªìÁÇπÔºåÊûö‰∏æ$t$‰∏∫Â∑¶Â≠êÊ†ëËäÇÁÇπ‰∏™Êï∞ÔºåÂàôÂè≥Â≠êÊ†ë‰∏∫$ÊÄªÁªìÁÇπ‰∏™Êï∞-t-1$(1ÊòØÂáèÊéâÊ†π)Ôºå‰πòÊ≥ïÂéüÁêÜÊää‰∏§‰∏™‰πòËµ∑Êù•ÔºåÊñπÁ®ã‰∏∫ dp[i][j]=\sum dp[t][j-1]\times dp[i-t-1][j-1]Ê≠£Â∏∏È¢ò[SDOI2011]Ê∂àËÄóÊàòÈ¢òÊÑèÔºöÁªôÂÆö$n$‰∏™ÁÇπÊúâËæπÊùÉÁöÑÊ†ëÔºåÂâ≤Êñ≠ËæπËä±Ë¥πËæπÊùÉÔºåÊ±Ç‰Ωø$k$‰∏™ÁÇπ‰∏é$1$ÁÇπ‰∏çËøûÈÄöÁöÑÊúÄÂ∞èËä±Ë¥π„ÄÇ Ë¶ÅÁî®ËôöÊ†ëÂÅöÔºåÂÜô‰∏Ä‰∏ãÊñπÁ®ã„ÄÇ ËÆæ$dp[n]$‰∏∫‰Ωø‰ª•$n$‰∏∫ÁªìÁÇπÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëÂÜÖÂÖ≥ÈîÆÁÇπÈÉΩ‰∏ç‰∏é$n$ËÅîÈÄöÁöÑÊúÄÂ∞èËä±Ë¥πÔºåÊñπÁ®ã‰∏∫ dp[u]=dp[u]+ \begin{cases} \min(dp[v],dist_{u,v})& \text{v‰∏çÊòØÂÖ≥ÈîÆÁÇπ}\\ dist_{u,v}& \text{vÊòØÂÖ≥ÈîÆÁÇπ} \end{cases}[ZJOI2010]ÊéíÂàóËÆ°Êï∞È¢òÊÑèÔºöÊ±Ç‰∏Ä‰∏™$1\sim n$ÁöÑÊéíÂàó$P_i$‰Ωø$ 1\leq i \leq n$Êó∂$P_i>P_{i/2}$ÁöÑÊñπÊ°àÊï∞„ÄÇ Áõ¥Êé•ÂÅöÊ≤°‰ªÄ‰πàÊÄùË∑ØÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÊÉ≥‰∏Ä‰∏ãÈô§‰∫åÁöÑÂÖ≥Á≥ªÂèØ‰ª•ÊòØ‰∫åÂèâÊ†ëÔºå‰∫éÊòØÊç¢Âà∞Ê†ë‰∏äÊù•ÂÅöÔºåÊ±Ç$n$‰∏™ËäÇÁÇπÁöÑ‰∫åÂèâÊ†ëÊª°Ë∂≥Â∞èÊ†πÂ†ÜÊÄßË¥®Ê†ëÁöÑ‰∏™Êï∞„ÄÇ ËÆæ$dp[i]$Ë°®Á§∫‰ª•$i$‰∏∫Ê†πÁöÑÂ≠êÊ†ëÂÜÖÊª°Ë∂≥Â∞èÊ†πÂ†ÜÊÄßË¥®ÁöÑÊñπÊ°àÊï∞Ôºå$s[i]$‰∏∫Ê†ëÁªìÁÇπÊï∞ÔºåÊèêÂâçÊää‰∏Ä‰∫õË∂äÁïåÁöÑÂàùÂÄºËÆæ‰∏∫$1$‰ª•ÂÖçÂà§Êñ≠ÔºåËΩ¨ÁßªÊó∂ÁªÑÂêàÊï∞ÁÆó‰∏Ä‰∏ãÈÄâÁªôÂ∑¶Â≠êÊ†ëÁöÑÁÇπÔºåËÆ∞ÂæóÂáèÂéªÊ†πËäÇÁÇπÔºå‰πò‰∏Ä‰∏ã‰∏§È¢óÂ≠êÊ†ëÁöÑÊñπÊ°àÊï∞Â∞±ok‰∫ÜÔºåÁªÑÂêàÊï∞Ë¶ÅÁî®lucasÔºåÊñπÁ®ã dp[i]=C_{s[i]-1}^{s[i\times 2]}dp[i\times 2]dp[i\times 2+1][SCOI2008]Â•ñÂä±ÂÖ≥È¢òÊÑèÔºö$m$ÁßçÁâ©ÂìÅÔºåÁªô‰Ω†nÊ¨°ÈöèÊú∫Âú®$1\sim m$Èó¥ÁöÑÁâ©ÂìÅÔºåÊØèÁßçÁâ©ÂìÅÊúâ‰ª∑ÂÄºÂπ∂‰∏îÈÄâËøôÁßçÁâ©ÂìÅÈúÄË¶Å‰Ω†Âú®Ââç$n-1$Ê¨°ÊääÈõÜÂêà$S$ÂÜÖÁöÑÁâ©ÂìÅÁßçÁ±ªÈÉΩÈÄâËøá‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÊâçÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄâ„ÄÇ ÊòæÁÑ∂$m$ÈùûÂ∏∏Â∞èÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÊ±ÇÊúüÊúõÁõ¥Êé•Êûö‰∏æÂ∞±ÂèØ‰ª•‰∫ÜÔºåËøôÊ†∑Â∞±Â•ΩÂÅö‰∫ÜÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂú®ËÄÉËôë‰∏Ä‰∏ãÂ¶ÇÊûúÈ°∫Êé®ÁöÑËØùÈúÄË¶Å‰øùËØÅ$S$ÁöÑÂêàÊ≥ïÊÄßÔºåËøô‰∏™ÊØîËæÉÈöæÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåÈÇ£‰πàÈÄÜÊé®ÊòæÁÑ∂Êõ¥Â•ΩÂÜô„ÄÇËÆæ$dp[i][S]$Ë°®Á§∫ÂèñÂâç$i-1$Ê¨°ÁöÑÁä∂ÊÄÅ‰∏∫$S$ÊòØÊúüÊúõÁöÑÊúÄÂ§ßÂÄºÔºå$pre[i]$‰∏∫Á¨¨$i$ÁßçÁâ©ÂìÅÁöÑÂâçÊèêÈõÜÂêàÔºåÊñπÁ®ãÊûö‰∏æÁ¨¨i‰∏™ÈÄâÁ¨¨kÁßç entry.content: Update on A.D.2019-08-09 Âè™‰ºöGCD ÂèñÊ®°(a+b) \bmod p=(a\bmod p+b\bmod p)\bmod p‚Äã(a-b) \bmod p=(a\bmod p-b\bmod p+p)\bmod p‚Äã(a\times b) \bmod p=(a\bmod p\times b\bmod p)\bmod p‚ÄãÊ±Ç$\dfrac{a}{b}\bmod p‚Äã$Êó∂,Ê±Ç$b^{-1}‚Äã$‰Ωø$b*b^{-1}\equiv1\pmod p‚Äã$Âç≥$b‚Äã$ÁöÑÈÄÜÂÖÉ Êúâ\dfrac{a}{b}\bmod p=a\times b^{-1}\bmod p Ë¥πÈ©¨Â∞èÂÆöÁêÜÂÆöÁêÜÔºöÂΩì$p‚Äã$ÊòØË¥®Êï∞Êó∂$a^{p-1}\equiv 1\pmod p‚Äã$ ÈÄÜÂÖÉÔºöÁî±$a^{p-1}\equiv 1\pmod p‚Äã$Âæó$a\times a^{p-2}\equiv 1\pmod p‚Äã$ Âç≥$a^{p-2}$ÊòØ$a$Âú®Ê®°$p$ÊÑè‰πâ‰∏ãÁöÑÈÄÜÂÖÉ Ê¨ßÊãâÂÆöÁêÜËã•$gcd(a,p)=1$Âàô$a^{\varphi(p)}\equiv1\pmod n$ ÂΩì$p$ÊòØË¥®Êï∞Êó∂$\varphi(p)=p-1$ Âç≥$a^{p-1}\equiv1\pmod n$Âç≥Ë¥πÈ©¨Â∞èÂÆöÁêÜ GCD EXGCD#define ll long long ll gcd(ll a, ll b) { return b ? gcd(b, a%b) : a; } void exgcd(ll a, ll b, ll &x, ll &y) { if(!b) x = 1, y = 0; else exgcd(b, a % b, y, x), y -= a / b * x; } $gcd$Áî®Êù•Ê±ÇËß£$aÔºåb$ÁöÑÊúÄÂ§ßÂÖ¨Á∫¶Êï∞ $lcm(a,b)=\dfrac{a\times b}{gcd(a,b)}‚Äã$ÔºålcmÊòØÊúÄÂ§ßÂÖ¨Á∫¶Êï∞ $exgcd$Áî®Êù•Ê±ÇËß£$ax+by=gcd(a,b)$ÔºåËØÅÊòéÂ§ßÊ¶ÇÊòØÂåñÂºèÂ≠êÊûÑÈÄ†ÈÄíÂΩíÁöÑËß£Ê≥ïÔºåÂèçÊ≠£Áúã‰∫Ü‰πüÊó©Êôö‰ºöÂøòÂ∞±ÊòØ‰∫ÜÈÄÉ $exgcd$ËøòÂèØ‰ª•Ê±ÇËß£$ax\equiv b\pmod p‚Äã$ÂΩ¢ÂºèÁöÑÂêå‰ΩôÊñπÁ®ã $exgcd(a,p,x,y)$Ê±ÇÂá∫Êù•ÁöÑ$x$Â∞±ÊòØ$a$ÂÖ≥‰∫é$p$ÁöÑÈÄÜÂÖÉ CRT exCRTÊ±ÇËß£‰∏Ä‰∏™Âêå‰ΩôÊñπÁ®ãÁªÑ \begin{cases} x \equiv a_1 \pmod {m_1} \\ x \equiv a_2 \pmod {m_2} \\ x \equiv a_n \pmod {m_n} \end{cases}‰∏§Áßç‰∏úË•øÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøáexgcd‰∏§‰∏§ÂêàÂπ∂Âêå‰ΩôÊñπÁ®ãÊ±ÇËß£Ôºå‰∏çËøáCRTÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•ÊûÑÈÄ†Âá∫Á≠îÊ°à„ÄÇ CRTÊ±ÇËß£ÁöÑ$p‚Äã$ÊòØË¥®Êï∞ÔºåexCRTÁöÑ‰∏çÊòØÔºåÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•Áî®exgcdÂêàÂπ∂ÂÅö„ÄÇ Êé®ÂØºÂèÇËÄÉËøô‰∏™blogÔºöÊâ©Â±ïÊ¨ßÂá†ÈáåÂæóÁÆóÊ≥ï‰∏é‰∏≠ÂõΩÂâ©‰ΩôÂÆöÁêÜ CRTÁõ¥Êé•ÊûÑÈÄ†ÁöÑËß£Ôºö ‰ª§$M=\prod m_i, M_i=\frac M{m_i}‚Äã$Ôºå$t_i‚Äã$‰∏∫$M_i‚Äã$Âú®Ê®°$m_i‚Äã$ÊÑè‰πâ‰∏ãÁöÑÈÄÜÂÖÉ ÊñπÁ®ãÁªÑÁöÑËß£‰∏∫x \equiv \sum_{i=1}^na_it_iM_i \pmod M‚Äã Á≠õÊ≥ïÊ±Ç$n$ÊòØ‰∏çÊòØÁ¥†Êï∞Áõ¥Êé•Êûö‰∏æ$1$Âà∞$\sqrt{n}$ËØïÈô§ ÂüÉÁ≠õ for(int i = 2; i <= N; i++) if(!vis[i]) { prime[++cnt] = i; for(int j = 1; i * j <= N; j++) vis[i * j] = 1; } Á∫øÁ≠õ for(int i = 2; i <= N; i++) { if(!vis[i]) prime[++cnt] = i; for(int j = 1; j <= cnt && i * prime[j] <= N; j++) { vis[i * prime[j]] = 1; if(i % prime[j] == 0) break; } }

2013Âπ¥1Êúà20Êó•Ôºå‰∏≠ÂõΩÂ§ßÈôÜÊîøÂ∫úÁöÑÈò≤ÁÅ´ÈïøÂüéÂà©Áî®ÂüüÂêçÊ±°ÊüìÂíåÂÖ≥ÈîÆËØçËøáÊª§Á≠âÊâãÊÆµÂ±èËîΩ GitHub„ÄÇ‰ΩÜÊòØÔºåÁî±‰∫éÂ±èËîΩÂºïÂèë‰∫ÜÁ§æ‰ºöÁöÑÂº∫ÁÉàÂèçÂ∫îÔºåÊúÄÁªàËß£Èô§‰∫ÜÂØπGitHubÁöÑÂ±èËîΩ„ÄÇ SteamÁ§æÂå∫ÁΩëÁ´ôË¢´Â±èËîΩ SteamËá™2015Âπ¥ÂºÄÂêØ‰∫∫Ê∞ëÂ∏ÅÁªìÁÆó‰ª•Êù•ÔºåÊõæÂ§öÊ¨°Âõ†ÈÉ®ÂàÜÁΩëÊ∞ëÂú®Á§æÂå∫ÂèëË°®ËøùÂèç‰∏≠ÂõΩÊ≥ïÂæãÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπËÄåÈÅ≠Âà∞Â±èËîΩÔºå
